translation: n.速度；步伐；(一)步v.踱步；(用步)测；(马)溜蹄走prep.用在人名前(礼貌的表达不同意见)
examples: (1) She works so fast that I can't keep pace with her.(2) When John found he was going to be late, he stepped up his pace.(3) They pace in sleek chivalric certainty.(4) The trot is a pace of the horse.(5) The lion paced the floor of his cage restlessly.(6) He gets up,and begin to pace up and down the room.(7) I pace the path and I know how long it is.
(1) 她工作得很快，我跟不上她的速度。(2) 约翰发现要迟到了, 就加大步伐。(3) 自信的步态骑士般孔武而自如。(4) 快步是马行的一种步态。(5) 狮子烦躁地在兽笼里走来走去。(6) 他起身并开始在房间里踱来踱去。(7) 我用步子量过这条路，我知道它有多长。

translation: adj.温和的；和平的；和解的Pacific.n.太平洋adj.太平洋的
examples: (1) The night was pacific.(2) He developed a pacific disposition in his childhood.(3) The result of this pacific policy was that no troops were called up.(4) They have pacific intentions.(5) These creatures live in the depth of the Pacific Ocean.(6) The spacecraft splashed down in the Pacific.(7) They must think you are a madman if you tell them you want to cross the Pacific on a raft.
(1) 黑夜静悄悄的。(2) 童年时他养成了温和的性情。(3) 这项和平政策的结果是不调集任何军队。(4) 他们有和解的意向。(5) 这些生物生活在太平洋的海底。(6) 那艘宇宙飞船溅落在太平洋中。(7) 如果你告诉他们你要乘木筏横渡太平洋，他们一定会认为你是个疯子。

translation: n.包裹；整批交易vt.把 ... 打包；把 ... 进行推销
examples: (1) The postman brought me a large package.(2) The ministers are trying to put together a package that will end the dispute.(3) Before you can deploy your solution, you must package it into a CAB file.(4) This is an attempt to package news as entertainment
(1) 邮递员给我送来一个大包裹。(2) 大臣们力图搞个一揽子交易结束这场争论。(3) 在部署解决方案之前,你必须将其打包到CAB文件中。(4) 这是一个把新闻包装成娱乐形式的尝试

translation: n.小袋；邮船；数据包
examples: (1) The Government has clapped an extra ten pence on a packet of cigarettes.(2) The postman tried to crush the packet through the letter-box.(3) There will be a packet to Calais.(4) For most applications, the default packet size is best.
(1) 政府对每包香烟额外提价十便士。(2) 邮递员使劲把邮件塞进信箱里。(3) 明天有邮船开到加莱去。(4) 对于大多数应用程序而言,最好使用默认数据包大小。

translation: n.桨；划桨；明轮翼v.划桨；戏水；抚弄
examples: (1) The butter churn has two paddles to whip the cream.(2) He dipped his paddle without a splash.(3) Each man has a paddle for an hour and then a rest.(4) He would himself paddle me off to the ship.(5) The people here paddle from place to place in canoe.(6) Children love to paddle at the beach.(7) She lay at the side of the pool and paddled in the water with her fingers.
(1) 奶油制造机有两根搅棍搅打奶油。(2) 他把他的短桨浸没有飞溅声。(3) 每个人划一个小时,然后休息一下。(4) 他愿亲自划船把我送上大船。(5) 这里的人用独木舟从一个地方划到另一个地方。(6) 孩子们喜欢在海滩嬉水。(7) 她躺在池子边上，用手指玩水。

translation: v.油漆；绘画n.油漆；颜料；绘画作品
examples: (1) I personally think we should paint the wall yellow.(2) They painted a coat of paint to prevent the oxidation of the ship by seawater.(3) She learns to paint in the fashion of Picasso.(4) I suggest you paint on wood instead of paper.(5) He likes to paint abstract designs on the walls.(6) The wall requires a new coat of paint.(7) Keep away from it. Don't you see the notice "Wet Paint"?(8) The artist brought his paints with him.(9) It is a great piece of paint.
(1) 我个人认为墙壁应该粉刷成黄色。(2) 他们刷了一层油漆以防止船只被海水氧化。(3) 她学着以毕加索的手法(绘画风格)绘画。(4) 我建议你在木头上画而不是在纸上画。(5) 他喜欢在墙上画抽象图案。(6) 这墙需要再涂一层新油漆。(7) 离远点。你没看见牌子上写著"油漆未乾"吗?(8) 那画家自带颜料。(9) 这是一幅绘画杰作。

translation: adj.苍白的；灰白的；暗淡的；无力的vi.变苍白；变黯淡；相形见绌n.栅栏
examples: (1) She was pale with fear.(2) His pale face has shown his bad health.(3) The pale eyes seemed to glare past her, the eyebrows frowned, the long jaw hardened.(4) This pale child of the Parisian faubourgs livesdevelops, makes connections, "grows supple" in suffering, in the presence of social realitiesof human things, a thoughtful witness.(5) His hair was pale and lightless.(6) When he returned, he looked pale and weary.(7) She paled with shock at the news.(8) She paled at the sight of the blood.(9) The clouds paled and pulled apart.(10) The devastating floods of two years ago pale in comparison to last week's storms.(11) Her problems paled into insignificance when compared with this family's tragedy.

(1) 她吓得脸色发白。(2) 他面色苍白，说明他身体不好。(3) 那双灰白的眼睛仿佛看穿了她的身子，眉头皱着，长下巴发僵。(4) 巴黎近郊的脸色灰白的孩子，面对着令人深省的社会现实和人间事物，活着，成长着，在苦难中沉下去，浮上来。(5) 他的头发灰暗没有光泽。(6) 当他回来的时候,他看上去脸色困乏无力。(7) 她听到那消息大惊失色。(8) 她一看到血就脸色苍白。(9) 云层变淡,渐渐疏散。(10) 比起上个礼拜的的暴风雨,两年前的连绵的洪水就逊色多了。(11) 她问题相比起这个大家庭的悲剧就微不足道了。

translation: n.薄煎饼v.（使）平坠着陆；（使）平展
examples: (1) I would like to put some raisins and strawberries on the pancake.(2) Please wrap the Beijing Roast duck in the pancake with the spring onion and the sweet bean sauce.
(1) 我想在薄煎饼上放些葡萄乾和草莓。(2) 请将北京烤鸭同葱和甜面酱一起包在薄煎饼里。

translation: n.惊慌；恐慌v.使…惊慌；感到恐慌adj.恐慌的；惊慌的
examples: (1) There was a panic when the building caught fire.(2) Rumours of an imminent earthquake startled a panic.(3) The thunder panicked the horse.(4) The idea might panic the investors.(5) I panic at the thought of my weakness and fear it being exposed.(6) The financial crisis caused panic selling of securities.
(1) 大楼起火时, 人们一片惊慌。(2) 谣传即将发生地震引起了一阵恐慌。(3) 雷声使受马惊了。(4) 这个想法可能会使投资者惶恐不安。(5) 想到自己的弱点,我惊恐不堪,更害怕这弱点被曝光。(6) 金融危机引发了恐慌之下的债权抛售。

translation: n.文书工作
examples: (1) Paperwork consumed much of the committee's time.(2) Behind the desk a single clerk busied himself with paperwork.(3) My secretary can not cope with the backlog of paperwork
(1) 文书工作耗费了委员会许多时间。(2) 桌子后面，一名职员正在埋头处理文书工作。(3) 我的秘书无力处理积压下来的文书作业。

translation: n.段落；节vt.将 ... 分段；写短评报道vi.写短评
examples: (1) The editor struck out the whole paragraph.(2) You'll find the last paragraph extremely apropos.(3) Look at the second paragraph on page fifteen.(4) This point has been dealt with in the preceding paragraph.(5) This paragraph relates to the October Revolution.(6) Don't omit this paragraph when you write your report.(7) The student is ask to paragraph an essay in class.(8) The teacher taught the students how to paragraph an essay.(9) The editor asked him to paragraph.
(1) 编辑把整段全删掉了。(2) 你会觉得最后一段文字极为中肯。(3) 请看第十五页的第二段。(4) 这一点在前面一段里已经交代过了。(5) 这一节内容是论述十月革命的。(6) 写报告时不要删去这一节。(7) 学生们被要求在课堂上给一篇文章分段。(8) 老师教学生如何把一篇文章分段。(9) 编辑让他写短评。

translation: adj.平行的；相同的；类似的；并联的n.对比；平行线(面)；双杠；相似物vt.相比；相应；与 ... 平行
examples: (1) In the parallel world, there might be an answer for everything.(2) Parallel processing is the most important peculiarity in this design.(3) The railway lines run parallel to the road.(4) My experience in this matter is parallel to yours.(5) My experience in selling is parallel to yours.(6) Japan's macroeconomic puzzle has a microeconomic parallel.(7) Elements may be connected in parallel, series, or any combination thereof.(8) It is inappropriate to draw such a parallel.(9) The trees stand in parallel with the road.(10) The gymnast swung on the parallel bars.(11) The accuracy of the parallel increased.(12) No one can parallel him in Math.(13) Actually no one can parallel him in poetry.(14) Her experiences parallel mine in many instances.(15) They parallel with one another.

(1) 在平行世界里,似乎有一切的答案。(2) 其中,并行化的设计理念是该设计的最大特点。(3) 铁路线和那条道路平行。(4) 在这件事情上，我的经验和你的类似。(5) 在销售方面,我的经验和你相仿。(6) 日本的宏观经济难题是与其微观经济并联的。(7) 这些硅碳棒可以是并联的，串连的，或者是串并混联的。(8) 这种比拟是不恰当的。(9) 这些树与公路平行。(10) 体操运动员在双杠上摆动身子。(11) 这种比拟变得愈来愈确切了。(12) 在数学方面无人能与他匹敌。(13) 实际上，在诗歌方面无人能同他相提并论。(14) 她的经历多与我的相似。(15) 他们相互平行。

translation: n.包裹；部分；一块(土地)vt.分配；打包
examples: (1) He snipped the string and untied the parcel.(2) He tied the parcel with twine.(3) Her stinginess is part and parcel of her nature.(4) Once you've explored a bit, perhaps you'll find a perfect parcel of land to build your house or business.(5) On the other hand, the opportunity cost of using land in a particular project cannot exceed the cost of buying an equivalent parcel to replace it.(6) He used to parcel out jobs to representatives.(7) He parceled up the books.
(1) 他剪断绳子，解开包裹。(2) 他用细绳来捆扎包裹。(3) 她生性吝啬。(4) 一旦你开始探险，你可能会找到一块理想的土地去建造你的房子或者发展你的商业。(5) 另外一方面，在一个特定项目中使用土地的机会成本不能超过购买一块等效的土地来替代它的成本。(6) 他曾将工作分配各个代表。(7) 他把书打成了包。

translation: n.巴黎；重楼（百合科植物）；帕里斯（姓氏）
examples: (1) Paris is the capital of France.(2) I have been away from Paris for two weeks.(3) First prize in the raffle is a holiday for two in Paris.(4) Have you ever been to Paris?(5) He sent me some postal cards from Paris.(6) She wrote a book on the Paris Commune.(7) He returned from Paris and found his office was under someone else's occupation.
(1) 巴黎是法国的首都。(2) 我离开巴黎已经两星期了。(3) 抽奖销售的头奖是两个人到巴黎度假旅游。(4) 你去过巴黎吗？(5) 他从巴黎给我寄来几张明信片。(6) 她写了一本关于巴黎公社的书。(7) 他从巴黎回来，发现他的办公室被别人占了。

translation: vi.参加；参与vt.分享
examples: (1) Everyone in the class is expected to participate in the discussion.(2) I don't want to participate in the English party.(3) Everyone in the class is expected to participate in the discussion.(4) I participate your suffering and joy.(5) She found him the only person who could participate thoroughly her feeling.
(1) 希望全班同学参加讨论。(2) 我不想参加英语晚会。(3) 希望全班同学参加讨论。(4) 我和你同甘共苦。(5) 她发现唯有他能完全理解她的感觉。

translation: adj.特定的；专指的；特殊的；特别的；挑剔的n.详情；细节
examples: (1) They depend on a particular historical situation.(2) I have nothing particular to do this evening.(3) Clouds must be given a particular attention.(4) She's very particular about what she wears.(5) He gave full particulars of the stolen property.
(1) 它们取决于特定的历史境况。(2) 今晚我没有什么特殊的事要做。(3) 必须对云给予特别的注意。(4) 她对衣著很讲究。(5) 他详细列出全部被盗的财物。

translation: adv.在一定程度上；部分地；不完全地
examples: (1) You have introduced a partly random component.(2) The transformation is partly due to demographics.(3) Their energy is partly dissipated.(4) This partly accounts for the efficiency of the company.
(1) 你介绍了一个在一定程度上属于偶然的成分。(2) 这一变化一定程度上是源于人口的变化。(3) 它们的能量被部分地消耗掉。(4) 这部分地说明了公司效率高的原因。

translation: n.伙伴；搭档；伴侣；合伙人v.同 ... 合作；做 ... 的搭档
examples: (1) He has a competent partner who always organizes everything well for him.(2) Will you be my partner in the next dance?(3) I am so lucky to have a partner like you to enjoy the beauty of life together.(4) Her partner tried to trick her out of her share.(5) They have to partner with the government, even if they are dismissive of its bureaucracy.(6) Gerry offered to partner me at tennis.
(1) 他有个很能干的伙伴,总是替他把一切弄得井井有条。(2) 下一支曲子时可否请你跟我一起跳舞?(3) 我真幸运,能拥有你这样的伴侣陪我一起享受生命中的美好。(4) 她的合伙人企图骗走她的股份。(5) 他们同政府合作,即使他们看不惯政府的官僚主义。(6) 格里提出和我一起搭档打网球。

translation: n.通过；通道；走廊；(文章等的)段落；(时间的)消逝
examples: (1) The bridge is not strong enough to allow the passage of vehicles.(2) The police kept a clear passage for the traffic.(3) We discovered a secret passage behind the wall.(4) This is our room, and yours is down the passage.(5) This passage may be given several interpretations.(6) He's had a rough passage since his son's death, with one illness after another.
(1) 这座桥不够牢固，车辆不能通行。(2) 警方使来往车辆畅通无阻。(3) 我们在墙后发现了一个秘密通道。(4) 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊的那一头。(5) 这段文字可以有不同的解释。(6) 自打他儿子死后他的日子过得很艰苦，病了一场又一场。

translation: n.过路人；经过者
examples: (1) The purse was picked up by a passer.(2) Somebody passing by asked me the way to the post office.
(1) 钱包被一个过路人捡到了。(2) 一个过路人问我去邮局怎么走。

translation: adj.被动的；消极的n.被动性
examples: (1) He played a passive role in the marriage.(2) You are passive when you allow things to happen, but do nothing.(3) Good is the passive that obeys reason.(4) Passive tear suctioning force can be demonstrated by a Venturi tube model.
(1) 他在婚姻中扮演了一个被动的角色。(2) 当你让这些事发生,而不做任何事来阻止它,你是消极的。(3) 善是服从理智的被动性。(4) 被动性泪液吸引之力量，可藉由文氏管模型来解释。

translation: n.护照；手段
examples: (1) Show me your passport, please.(2) My passport has been transacted.(3) He views boxing as his passport out of poverty.(4) He thought that money was a passport to high society.
(1) 请出示护照。(2) 我的护照已经办完了。(3) 他把拳击看作自己摆脱贫困的手段。(4) 他以为金钱是通往上流社会的手段。

translation: n.专利；特许vt.给予专利权adj.专利的；显著的
examples: (1) The patent runs out in three years time.(2) He got a patent for this invention.(3) The government patented the device to its inventor.(4) This is a packet of a patent cement mix.(5) This is a fact patent to the world.(6) It was patent to everyone that he disliked the idea.
(1) 这项专利期限为3年。(2) 他获得了这项发明的专利权。(3) 政府给予发明者专利权。(4) 这是一包专利水泥混合料。(5) 这是全世界都明白的事实。(6) 每个人都看得出来他不喜欢这个主意。

translation: n.耐心；忍耐；毅力
examples: (1) Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.(2) His patience was worn out by all these troubles.(3) She owes her success to hard work and patience.(4) His rudeness was beyond my patience.(5) Learning to walk again after his accident required great patience.
(1) 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。(2) 这么多麻烦使他都没有耐心了。(3) 她的成功是努力工作和耐心的结果。(4) 他的粗暴使我无法忍受。(5) 他出事后重新学习走路要有极大的毅力。

translation: n.模式；图案；典范；式样v.以图案装饰；仿造；模仿
examples: (1) The two buildings are modeled after the same pattern.(2) Training and education follow different patterns in different regions.(3) This cloth has a pattern of blue and white squares.(4) Threads of different colors and textures were woven into an intricate pattern.(5) She is a pattern of virtue.(6) This company set a pattern of what a good company should be.(7) Please cut out my overcoat according to this pattern.(8) I like the carpets patterned with peonies.(9) He patterned himself upon a man he admired.(10) This is a new approach patterned on Japanese ideas.
(1) 这两座建筑是按照同一模式建造的。(2) 培训和教育在不同的地区遵循不同的模式。(3) 这种布有蓝白格子的图案。(4) 各种花色和质地的线织成了一幅复杂的图案。(5) 她是美德的典范。(6) 这家公司是好公司的典范。(7) 我这件大衣请你照这个式样裁剪。(8) 我喜欢印有牡丹花图案的地毯。(9) 他模仿一位他钦佩的人。(10) 这是模仿日本概念而设计的新方法。

translation: 体育； 体育课
examples: (1) A school course in physical education.(2) Study on the Aesthetic Education in Colleges P. E.(3) In most schools physical education is compulsory.(4) We haven't had any physical trainingclasses this week.
(1) 体操课学校体育教育中的一门课程(2) 高校体育教学中的美学教育探析。(3) 在大部分学校里体育课是必修课。(4) 这星期我们还没上过体育课。

translation: n.个人计算机
examples: (1) Be careful how you start the personal computer.(2) Microcomputer is a very small computer,such as a laptop or personal computer.
(1) 要注意怎样起动个人计算机。(2) 微机计算机是一种非常小的计算机，如膝上机或个人计算机。

translation: n.和平；安静
examples: (1) The situation poses a grave threat to world peace.(2) The dove is the emblem of peace.(3) She's never at peace with herself.(4) You'll be able to read in peace here.
(1) 这局势对世界和平构成了严重的威胁。(2) 鸽子是和平的象徵。(3) 她总是静不下来。(4) 你可以在这里安静地看书。

translation: adj.和平的；安宁的
examples: (1) Hopes of a peaceful settlement are now fading.(2) China is a peaceful country.(3) The world today is far from peaceful.(4) Law and order are necessary for a peaceful society.(5) My husband loves adventurous life while I enjoy a more peaceful domestic life.
(1) 和平解决的希望正在消失。(2) 中国是一个爱好和平的国家。(3) 今天的世界还很不安宁。(4) 法律和秩序对于社会安宁是必需的。(5) 我丈夫喜欢充满冒险的生活，而我则喜欢宁静的家居生活。

translation: n.桃子；桃树；桃红色
examples: (1) The peach is a sweet and juicy fruit.(2) The beauty of the peach blossom is beyond description.(3) There is a peach standing by the lake.(4) Peach is the most popular color this season.
(1) 桃子是甜又多汁的水果。(2) 桃花的美丽难以形容。(3) 湖边有棵桃树。(4) 桃红色是这一季最受欢迎的颜色。

translation: n.农民
examples: (1) That night we put up in a peasant's home.(2) It is the lament of an impoverished peasant.
(1) 那天晚上我们住在一个农民的家里。(2) 它是一个已贫穷化的农民的哀词。

translation: adj.徒步的；缺乏想像的n.行人
examples: (1) We enjoy all pedestrian activities.(2) They ought to stop at the pedestrian crossing.(3) He was rather a pedestrian student.(4) We present this approach in a pedestrian version.(5) The driver was slanging a pedestrian who had got in his way.(6) Being a good pedestrian is just as important as being a good driver.
(1) 我们喜欢所有的步行活动。(2) 他们该停在人行横道上。(3) 他原是个相当平常的学生。(4) 我们用平铺直叙的方式介绍这个方法。(5) 那司机破口大骂挡他的路的行人。(6) 做一个好的行人就像做一个好的司机一样重要。

translation: n.笔友
examples: (1) They have pen pals in the United Kingdom.(2) I want a pen pal to correspond with.
(1) 他们有英国的笔友。(2) 我想要一个通信的笔友。

translation: n.便士；【美】分
examples: (1) I only have a few pennies with me.(2) He said that he wouldn't lend me a penny.(3) He felt in his pocket for a penny.(4) He keeps track of every penny he spend.(5) We should make every penny count.
(1) 我身上只有几个便士。(2) 他说过他一便士都不愿借给我。(3) 他在口袋里摸索着找一个便士。(4) 他记录他花掉的每一分钱。(5) 我们每一分钱都要花在刀刃上。

translation: n.养老金；退休金；抚恤金；年金；（欧洲等地的）私人小旅店v.发退休金
examples: (1) He's got nothing beyond his state pension.(2) He went to the post office to draw his pension.(3) concede one's attention(4) He had stayed at the pension for a fortnight.(5) He was pensioned off and replaced with a younger man.
(1) 除了国家发的养老金，他一无所有。(2) 他到邮局去取退休金了。(4) 他已在那个小旅馆待了两个星期。(5) 他被迫退休，由一年轻人接替其职务。

translation: prep.每；每一；经过；按照
examples: (1) These apples cost five yuan per kilogram.(2) We were bowling along (the motorway) at seventy miles per hour.(3) The vessel tax of anchorage is 5,000 dollars per year.(4) Tickets to the concert are $50 per head!(5) The goods were shipped per steamer.(6) Cars will be supplied as per the terms agreed on.
(1) 这些苹果每公斤五元。(2) 我们以每小时七十英里的速度(在高速公路上)飞驰。(3) 这艘船的停泊税一年是五千美元。(4) 这场音乐会的门票价格是每人五十美元。(5) 货物由船舶运送。(6) 汽车将按所有条款达成一致后供应。

translation: n.百分比adv.百分之 ...adj.百分之 ... 的
examples: (1) The number of queues repaired out of the percent detected.(2) Twenty percent of the products are exported.(3) The company's market share is 48 percent in the marketplace.(4) The gross national product had increased 5 percent last year.(5) The millionaire has handed over 50 percent of his stock to his first son.(6) The covering of forestry in our town is 60 percent.(7) I am a hundred percent in agreement with you.(8) We give 10 percent discount for cash.
(1) 修复的队列数目超过检测到的百分比。(2) 百分之二十的产品外销。(3) 这家公司的市场占有率是百分之四十八。(4) 去年的国民生产总值提高了百分之五。(5) 这个百万富翁已把他一半的股票移交给他的长子。(6) 我们镇的森林覆盖率是百分之六十。(7) 我百分之百同意你的看法。(8) 现金付款，我们九折优惠。

translation: n.百分率；比例；部分；好处
examples: (1) The percentage at grade E and above for day school candidates in the HKCEE was 67.5 compared with 65.6 in 1998.(2) What percentage of the earth is covered by oceans?(3) Whisky contains a large percentage of alcohol.(4) The percentage of unskilled workers is small.(5) Each of them got a percentage of the profits.(6) We have only a small percentage of foreign books.(7) There is no percentage in worrying about it.
(1) 中学会考日校考生报考的科目成绩达E级或以上的有67.(2) 地球上百分之多少被海水覆盖着？(3) 威士忌所含酒精的百分比很高。(4) 非熟练工的比例很小。(5) 他们每个人都得到一部分利润。(6) 我们只有一少部分外文书。(7) 为此担忧无济於事。

translation: adj.完美的；完全的；完满的；十足的；理想的vt.使完美；使完全
examples: (1) Laurel was a perfect girl in every way.(2) No one expects you to be perfect, but we do expect you to do your best always.(3) I insist on perfect sobriety and silence.(4) The more obedient daughters are, the more often there is no perfect life, especially the marital problems.(5) Therefore, relatively more perfect steroid withdrawl regimens have been studied by many researchers at home and abroad.(6) She's a perfect angel!(7) If you could make a wish, what would be your perfect job?(8) She went to France to perfect her French.(9) He endeavored to perfect his ability.
(1) 从各方面讲，罗拉都是一个完美的女孩。(2) 没人指望你完美无缺，但是我们盼望你永远尽最大的努力。(3) 我坚决要求完全的肃静。(4) 越是听话的女儿，往往越没有完满的人生，尤其是婚姻问题。(5) 因而国内外众多学者一直在研究相对完满的撤离激素方案。(6) 她是真正的好人!(7) 在你的理想中,最好的工作是什么?(8) 她为了学好法语去过法国。(9) 他努力增进实力。

translation: v.执行；履行；表演；运转；举行
examples: (1) Every manager must perform some duties of a ceremonial nature.(2) Student teams perform a comprehensive analysis and valuation of a business, as outlined in the syllabus.(3) They always perform their duties faithfully.(4) We will resolutely perform our internationalist duty no matter what happens.(5) He is going to perform magic at the party.(6) John is a bullfighter. Death hangs over his head every time he performs.(7) The machine performs well.(8) Members of certain tribes perform special ceremonies when they reach manhood.
(1) 每个管理者必须执行一些礼仪性的任务。(2) 如同课程大纲所提及，每一组学生都要对一个企业执行广泛的分析与评价。(3) 他们总是忠实地履行自己的职责。(4) 不管发生什么情况，我们都要坚决履行我们的国际主义义务。(5) 他将在晚会上表演魔术。(6) 约翰是斗牛士，每次出场表演都要面临死亡的威胁。(7) 那部机器运转良好。(8) 某些部落的男人在达到成年时要举行特殊的庆祝仪式。

translation: n.表演者；执行者
examples: (1) The performer juggled with knives and swords.(2) The performer removes a notepad and pen.(3) Performer strolls out grumbling and shows his lunchbox empty.
(1) 表演者耍弄刀剑。(2) 执行者去除笔记薄和笔。(3) 执行者漫步抱怨并且显示他的饭盒空。

translation: n.香水；香气vt.洒香水于；使香气弥漫
examples: (1) The room reeked of cheap perfume.(2) The smell of her perfume lingered in the empty house.(3) A mist of perfume hung in the air.(4) Can you smell the perfume of the roses?(5) She perfumed herself with Eau de Cologne.(6) The lemon trees are blossoming and the flowers perfume the valleys and hills.
(1) 房间里弥漫著劣质香水的呛鼻气味。(2) 空屋里仍然飘溢著她的香水味。(3) 空气中飘溢著香水的雾气。(4) 你能闻到玫瑰花的香味吗？(5) 她身上洒著古龙水。(6) 柠檬树上的花盛开了，花香弥漫了整个山谷。

translation: n.一段时间；周期；时期；课时；学时；句号；月经
examples: (1) He feels completely restored to health after a period of intensive care.(2) The exercise period was similar to the previous study.(3) Childhood is a period of rapid growth.(4) He teaches 10 periods a week.(5) This course needs 30 periods in all, and case analysis will use 4 periods.(6) Use a period at the end of the sentence.
(1) 通过一段时间的精心照顾，他感到身体完全康复了。(2) 运动周期类似前面的研究。(3) 幼年是生长迅速的时期。(4) 他每周授课10课时。(5) 本课程的总学时是30学时，其中4学时是让学生做案例分析。(6) 在一个句子的末尾用句号。

translation: adj.永久的；持久的n. 烫发
examples: (1) The incident left permanent traces on his mind.(2) I am looking for a permanent position.(3) These factors usually have a longer and more permanent impact on share prices.
(1) 那件事在他头脑里留下了永久的印象。(2) 我在找一个永久性的职业。(3) 这项因素通常会对股价产生更加长远和持久的影响。

translation: n.许可；允许；同意
examples: (1) They entered the area without permission.(2) You were wrong to take the car without permission.(3) You must ask permission if you want to leave early.(4) Do I have your permission to change the date?(5) She refused to give her permission.
(1) 他们未经许可擅入该地。(2) 你未得许可就把汽车开走是不应该的。(3) 如果你想早走的话，必须得到允许。(4) 您允许我改变一下日期吗？(5) 他拒不同意。

translation: n.许可证；执照v.允许；许可
examples: (1) You can't work here without a work permit.(2) He said that if he had a permit he could get a job.(3) I'll come after the meeting if time permits.(4) You are not permitted to smoke here.(5) The rules of the club do not permit smoking.
(1) 你没有许可证就不能在这里工作。(2) 他说如果他有执照就能找到工作。(3) 如果时间许可的话，我开完会就来。(4) 此处不许吸烟。(5) 这个俱乐部的规章不允许吸烟。

translation: adv.就个人而言；亲自地；个别地；作为个人；有私交地
examples: (1) Personally, I like blue best.(2) She saw to the comforts of her guests personally.(3) I really need to talk to him personally.(4) He was personally criticized by inspectors for his incompetence.(5) I have nothing against Sandy personally, but her family's a bit strange.(6) I dislike him personally, but I admire his art.(7) Don't take my remarks about your plan personally.
(1) 我个人最喜欢蓝色。(2) 她亲自照顾客人。(3) 我真的需要亲自跟他说。(4) 他因能力差而受到检查员的个别批评。(5) 我对桑迪本人并不反感，只是她的家庭有点怪。(6) 我不喜欢他的为人,但我钦佩他的艺术。(7) 不要把我对你那计划的评论看作是针对你个人。

translation: vt.说服；劝说
examples: (1) How can I persuade you of my sincerity?(2) We are persuaded of the justice of her case.(3) I am not fully persuaded by the evidence.(4) You try and persuade her (to come out with us).(5) He is easily persuaded.
(1) 我如何能够让你相信我的诚意？(2) 我们确信对她案件的审理是公正的。(3) 这证据不足以使我充分信服。(4) 你去试试劝她(跟我们一起出去)吧。(5) 他这人好说话。

translation: n.害虫；讨厌的人
examples: (1) Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests.(2) It won't be long before we can be rid of the pest altogether.(3) That child is being a real pest.(4) My little brother is a pest when he spoils my games.
(1) 储存的谷物经常受到害虫的破坏。(2) 不要太久，我们就能把这种害虫消除干净。(3) 那个孩子真讨厌。(4) 我的小弟弟破坏我的各种游戏真讨厌。

translation: n.汽油
examples: (1) The petrol is running out.(2) My car is rather heavy on petrol.(3) They have increased the price of petrol again.(4) My new car really runs away with the petrol.(5) They had to ration petrol during the war.(6) The police faced a mob throwing bricks and petrol bombs.
(1) 汽油快要耗尽了。(2) 我的汽车很费油。(3) 他们又提高了汽油的价格。(4) 我的新汽车耗油太多了。(5) 战时他们不得不限量供给汽油。(6) 警察面对一群投掷砖块和汽油弹的暴徒。

translation: n.现象；奇人；奇事
examples: (1) Their so-called prosperity is only a temporary phenomenon.(2) International terrorism is not just a recent phenomenon.(3) Magnetism is a natural phenomenon.(4) A child who could read at the age of one would indeed be a phenomenon.(5) Beethoven was a phenomenon among musicians.(6) There are special reasons for this unusual phenomenon.
(1) 但他们所谓的繁荣只是一个暂时的现象。(2) 国际恐怖主义并不是近年才有的现象。(3) 磁力是一种自然现象。(4) 一个一岁的孩子能阅读，会被认为是个神童。(5) 贝多芬是音乐家中的奇才。(6) 这种奇事的发生，有其独特的原因。

translation: n.电话间
examples: (1) He went into the phone booth and dialed the number.(2) I'll give him a call from the phone booth on the corner.(3) I'm lost. Can you direct me to the nearest phone booth?(4) There is a phone booth in the corner.(5) He went into the phone booth and dial the number.(6) Is there a pay phone booth around here ?
(1) 他走进电话亭拨了号码。(2) 我到街角的电话亭给他打个电话。(3) 我迷路了。你能告诉我最近的一个电话亭在哪吗？(4) 在转角处有个电话亭。(5) 他走进电话亭拨了号码。(6) 这附近有没有公用电话?

translation: n.相片vi.拍照，摄影；被照相vt.给 ... 照相
examples: (1) I planned to enlarge this photograph.(2) This photograph flatters you.(3) I always photograph badly.(4) Some people just don't photograph well.(5) Stand still while I photograph you.
(1) 我计划放大这张照片。(2) 这照片比你本人漂亮。(3) 我照相总是照不好。(4) 有些人就是不上相。(5) 我给你照像，别动。

translation: n.摄影师
examples: (1) The photographer retouched her picture.
(1) 摄影师对她的照片作了修整。

translation: n.短语；习语；措辞；[音]乐句vt.措词；将(乐曲)分成乐句
examples: (1) The new phrase is now on the tongue of men.(2) The teacher dictated the phrase to the class.(3) He hashed a phrase in order to colour the sentence.(4) The speaker certainly knew how to turn a phrase.(5) Four whipping bars, ff as well as marcatissimo, put a more or less vicious and peremptory end to the phrase.(6) Notice syncopation in the second phrase where the accent falls after the first beat.(7) She will phrase a fugue of Bach's in these days.
(1) 这个新短语现在正十分流行。(2) 老师让全班同学听写这个短语。(3) 他反复推敲一个习语以使该句增色。(4) 该讲话者当然懂得如何措辞。(5) 四个鞭打般的小节，以带强调的最强音给乐句一个或多或少野蛮而断然的结束。(6) 注意第二乐句中的切分音，重音在第一拍之后出现。(7) 这几天她将把巴赫的赋格曲分成旋律分句。

translation: adj.物质的；身体的；体力的；物理的；肉体上的，身体上的体格检查
examples: (1) It's a physical impossibility to be in two places at one time.(2) Physical disability causes mental anguish.(3) Staying up late makes him at his worst in terms of physical situation.(4) For them, getting rid of heavy physical labour is a big thing
(1) 同时在两地是自然规律上不可能的事。(2) 生理伤残会引起心理苦闷。(3) 熬夜使得他的体力状况处于低潮。(4) 对他们来说, 摆脱重体力劳动是一件大事。

translation: n.内科医生
examples: (1) He was attended by his personal physician.(2) He prefers to be a surgeon rather than a physician.(3) The physician put him on a special diet.(4) He consulted his physician about his health.
(1) 他的私人医生护理他。(2) 他喜欢当外科医生而不愿作内科医生。(3) 内科医生给他吃特定的食物。(4) 他请医生诊断他的健康。

translation: n. 物理学家； 自然科学家
examples: (1) The physicist fudged on his experimental data.(2) He came to the fore as a physicist at an early age.
(1) 那位物理学家捏造实验数据。(2) 他在早年就成了杰出的物理学家。

translation: n.钢琴家
examples: (1) It takes years of discipline to become a pianist.(2) The pianist accompanied her singing.
(1) 要成为钢琴家需经多年训练。(2) 钢琴家为她的歌唱伴奏。

translation: n.堆；大量；绒面；桩；大笔钱财高大的旧建筑v.堆积；积累；拥入；夸张
examples: (1) We put the books in piles on the floor.(2) I have a huge pile of letters to deal with.(3) The thick pile of a luxurious bath towel touches soft.(4) He has made a study on depth effect of pile foundation.(5) See that pile of lumbering by the barn?(6) The little boy is piling up his building blocks.(7) The cart is piled high with fruit and vegetables.(8) Try to solve it immediately and never pile up problems for yourself.(9) Cars often pile up here in the rush hours.(10) It's probably not as bad as she says she does tend to pile it on.(11) The situation is frightful, but it's just piling on the agony to keep discussing it.

(1) 我们把书在地板上堆起来。(2) 我有一大堆信件要处理。(3) 这块华丽浴巾的厚绒面摸起来很柔软。(4) 他对桩基深度效应进行了探讨。(5) 你看见谷仓旁的那堆木材吗?(6) 小男孩正在搭积木。(7) 马车上堆满了水果和蔬菜。(8) 尽量快点解决，不要为自己积攒问题。(9) 在交通拥挤时刻汽车往往在这里挤成一团。(10) 大概不像她说的那么糟－－她确实有意夸大事实。(11) 情况很可怕，可是还一个劲儿地议论让人觉得更可怕。

translation: n.药丸；药片v.服用药丸；把 ... 制成药丸；投票反对
examples: (1) Father must take his pill on the hour.(2) The baby spat out the nasty pill.(3) This pill will help to settle your nerves.(4) His mother told him to have a vitamin pill before leaving.(5) Occasionally she had to take sleeping pills.(6) She was nervous about returning to the pill because of worries about a possible cancer risk.
(1) 父亲必须在每点钟准点吃药丸。(2) 婴儿吐出了难吃的药丸。(3) 你吃了这片药神经就不那麽紧张了。(4) 他妈妈让他在走之前吃一颗维生素药丸。(5) 她偶尔不得不吃安眠药。(6) 因为担心可能患癌症的风险，她对再服用药丸很紧张。

translation: n.枕头vt.枕；搁；垫
examples: (1) He bought a foam pillow.(2) My daughter asked me to buy her a pillow stuffed with feathers.(3) I want to consult with my pillow before I take a decision.(4) Her arm pillowed the sleeping child.(5) She lay down on the bed and put her head on the pillow tiredly.(6) Birdlike, he retired at dusk, lying on the bare floor with a wooden block under his head like a pillow.
(1) 他买了一个海绵枕头。(2) 我女儿请求我给她买一个羽绒枕头。(3) 在我做出决定前，我要好好考虑一下。(4) 熟睡的孩子枕着她的手臂。(5) 她在床上躺下来，脑袋疲惫地搁在枕头上。(6) 在黄昏时分，他象鸟儿一样就寝，只用一块木头搁在头下面当作枕头，躺在光溜溜的地板上。

translation: n.飞行员；领航员；试播节目；排障器；[机]导向器v.驾驶；领航；向导；试点adj.试验性的；引导的
examples: (1) Mark used to be a pilot on the Mississippi River.(2) JULES I think her biggest deal was she starred in a pilot.(3) When did you learn to pilot an airplane?(4) Your job is to pilot the ship into the harbor.(5) He piloted the old lady through the crowd to her seat.(6) Tourists need a guide to pilot them through the desert.(7) Schools in this area are piloting the new maths course.(8) We are doing a pilot study to see if the new product will sell well.
(1) 马克曾在密西西比河上当过领航员。(2) 朱尔斯：我想她最重要的演出是在一个试片里担任主角。(3) 你什么时候学会驾驶飞机的?(4) 你的工作是引导该船入港。(5) 他领着这位老人穿过人群走到她的座位上。(6) 旅游人员需要向导带领他们走过沙漠。(7) 这一带的学校正试用新的数学教程。(8) 我们正在为这种新产品做试销调查，看它的销路好不好。

translation: n.别针（大头针）；徽章；脚v.钉住；别住；固定住abbr.个人识别码（=Personal Identification Number）,邮编（=Postal Index Number）
examples: (1) I bought a tie pin for my husband yesterday.(2) He pinned the notice to the board.(3) Pin the bills together so you don't lose them.(4) The general pinned the medal on the soldier's chest.
(1) 昨天我给丈夫买了一支领带别针。(2) 他把通知钉在布告牌上。(3) 把账单别在一起以防遗失。(4) 将军把奖章别在这位士兵的胸前。

translation: n.松树；松木vi.消瘦；渴望
examples: (1) The pine trees defy severe cold.(2) It's a noted place for its pine tree and springs.(3) There is a pine forest near our house.(4) Pine is a soft wood and teak is a hard wood.(5) He pined away after his daughter died.(6) Alone,a lonely stranger in a foreign land,I pine for kinsfolk doubly on a holiday.(7) He began to pine for the sight of his sweet partner's face.
(1) 松树不畏严寒。(2) 这是一个以松树和泉水著称的地方。(3) 我们家附近有片松树林。(4) 松木是软木，柚木是硬木。(5) 他的女儿死后，他逐渐变得憔悴了。(6) 独在异乡为异客每逢佳节倍思亲(7) 他开始渴望看到他那可爱的舞伴的脸庞。

translation: n.菠萝；凤梨；手榴弹
examples: (1) Cut some pineapple for your sister.(2) Tom likes to eat pineapple very much.(3) I bought some tinned pineapples to visit her.(4) It's impossible to cut a pineapple with such a dull knife.(5) She drank a cup of pineapple juice.
(1) 给你姐姐切几片菠萝吧。(2) 汤姆非常喜欢吃菠萝。(3) 我买了一些菠萝罐头去看她。(4) 用一把这么钝的刀子切菠萝是不可能的。(5) 她喝了一杯凤梨汁。

translation: n.品脱（容量单位，主要在英国、美国及爱尔兰使用）
examples: (1) Draw off another pint of beer, please.(2) I bought a pint of milk in the store.
(1) 请再量出一品脱啤酒。(2) 我在这家商店里买了一品脱牛奶。

translation: n.管子；烟斗；管乐器vt.以管输送；装管道；吹奏；尖声说；(为衣服等)滚边vi.吹奏管乐；尖叫
examples: (1) Water is spouting out of the pipe.(2) The workers are laying pipes under the road.(3) The plumber went down to the cellar to fix the leaky pipe.(4) He rammed the tobacco into his pipe.(5) The snake rose out of the backet and began to follow the movements of the pipe.(6) The people in the village used to pipe water .(7) He would pipe away on his flute all day and night.(8) The woman piped her disapproval.(9) He would pipe away on his flute all day and night.(10) Wind began to pipe around the tall building.
(1) 水正从管子里喷出来。(2) 工人们正在道路下面铺设管道。(3) 管道工到地下室去修漏水的管子。(4) 他把烟丝塞进烟斗。(5) 蛇从篮子里探出身随着管乐器的节奏而动起来。(6) 这个村子里的人过去常以管道输送水。(7) 他可以整天整夜地吹奏长笛。(8) 那妇人尖声嚷叫不赞成。(9) 他可以整天整夜地吹奏长笛。(10) 风在高层建筑四周呼啸起来。

translation: adj.清楚的；简单的；坦白的；平常的；朴素的；纯的n.平原；广阔的区域adv.完全地；纯粹地
examples: (1) It was plain to everyone that she was not happy.(2) The restaurant serves plain home-made meals.(3) She was admired for her plain speaking.(4) Most people see great men as wizards; however, they are just plain people.(5) Her plain black dress was too severe for such a cheerful occasion.(6) I drink only pure water after taking exercises.(7) The wind whipped across the plain.(8) The mountain stands tall and upright on the vast plain.(9) Shanghai in Yangtze Delta alluvial plain, low-lying, the network of waterways covered with vast shoals resources.(10) That is just plain stupid.
(1) 她并不幸福,这是明摆着的事实。(2) 那个餐馆供应简单的家常菜。(3) 她说话坦白,这一点令人钦佩。(4) 大多数人觉得伟人是奇才,然而,他们只不过是平常人。(5) 她穿着黑色连衣裙(6) 运动之后我只喝纯净水。(7) 大风扫过平原。(8) 这座高山屹然矗立在广阔的平原上。(9) 上海位于长江口冲积平原，地势低洼，河网密布，拥有广阔的滩涂资源。(10) 那简直是愚不可及.

translation: n.行星
examples: (1) The Earth is a planet.(2) Mars is the fourth planet in order from the sun.(3) They claimed to have discovered a new planet.(4) It is the only planet that we know harbors life.
(1) 地球是一颗行星。(2) 火星是太阳系的第四颗行星。(3) 他们宣称发现了一颗新的行星。(4) 它是我们所知唯一适合生物生存的行星。

translation: n.月台；讲台；平台；站台；(政党的)政纲
examples: (1) Any train from this platform stops at Gatwick.(2) He was walking up and down the station platform.(3) Jane walked boldly up to the platform without faltering.(4) A balcony is a platform with a wall.(5) Please buy me a platform ticket.(6) The party's platform is reducing taxes.
(1) 从这一月台开出的火车都在盖特威克停。(2) 他在火车站的月台上走来走去。(3) 简沉著大胆地走上讲台。(4) 阳台是有墙的平台。(5) 请给我买张站台票。(6) 那个政党的政治纲领是减税。

translation: n.游戏室；娱乐室
examples: (1) The playroom is designed for the children.
(1) 这间游戏室是为孩子们设计的。

translation: n.玩伴；游伴
examples: (1) He was my playmate in childhood.
(1) 他是我童年时的玩伴。

translation: n.丰富；大量；充足adj.充足的；相当多的adv.非常；充分
examples: (1) She has plenty of imagination.(2) I padded out my answer with plenty of quotations.(3) You have plenty of time to read.(4) A growing child needs plenty of sleep.(5) There is plenty of rain this year.(6) There was plenty water to quench our thirst.(7) I've got plenty things to take care of.(8) The rope is plenty long enough to reach the ground.
(1) 她的想象力非常丰富。(2) 我用了大量引文把答案拉长。(3) 你有大量的时间读书。(4) 正发育的孩子必须睡眠充足。(5) 今年雨水充足。(6) 这里有足够的水解渴。(7) 我有许多事要处理。(8) 绳子长可及地。

translation: n.情节；阴谋；图；(小块)土地v.密谋；绘图；计划；标示位置
examples: (1) The plot thickens.(2) They are brewing a plot behind the scenes.(3) The silly ending robs the plot of any credibility.(4) The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.(5) He made a plot of the route of the hike.(6) The triangular plot allows all three values to be read off easily.(7) I grow potatoes on my little plot of land.(8) They are plotting how to murder him.(9) Those who plot and conspire will certainly come to no good end.(10) You can plot one or more data series in a chart.(11) You should plot out your time properly.

(1) 情节复杂起来了。(2) 他们正在幕后策划一个阴谋。(3) 这愚蠢的结尾使得整个情节变得一点都不可信。(4) 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害。(5) 他为远足的路线画了一张图。(6) 我们使用三角图很容易读出全部三个数值。(7) 我在那一小块地上种土豆。(8) 他们在密谋如何杀害他。(9) 搞阴谋诡计的人绝不会有好下场。(10) 可以在图表中绘制一个或多个数据系列。(11) 你应该合理分配自己的时间。

translation: n.塞子；插头；推销；火花塞；口嚼烟v.塞；堵；宣传；插上插头；苦干
examples: (1) She pulled the plug out of the bathtub and the dirty water ran away.(2) She put the electric plug into the socket.(3) The TV compere gave her new record a plug.(4) Fuel is ignited by the spark plug.(5) I need to buy car spark plug,please and contact us.(6) You don't need to plug your ears. The music is not so loud.(7) We must plug the hole in the rowboat.(8) They try their best to plug the new song .(9) The girl asked her mother to plug in the TV set.(10) We ought to plug away at our work.
(1) 她把浴缸的塞子拔掉，脏水流走了。(2) 她将电插头插到了插座里。(3) 电视节目主持人极力推荐她的新唱片。(4) 燃料由火花塞点火。(5) 我们需要求购汽车火花塞，请联系我们。(6) 你不用塞住耳朵,音乐又不是很吵。(7) 我们必须把划艇的洞堵上。(8) 他们尽全力宣传这首新歌。(9) 女孩叫母亲插上电视机的插头。(10) 我们应该努力坚持工作。

translation: n.诗；韵文
examples: (1) He wrote a poem praising her loveliness.(2) The girl repeated the poem after I had read it twice.(3) The poem showed great intensity of feeling.
(1) 他写了一首诗赞扬她的美丽。(2) 我读了两遍这首诗，这个小女孩就会背诵了。(3) 这篇韵文表现出强烈的激情。

translation: n.诗人
examples: (1) A great poet is a master melody.(2) It is written by an obscure young poet.(3) The poet expressed his burning passion for the woman he loved.(4) He was awarded the poet laureate by the queen.(5) The poet compares his lover to a rose in his poems.
(1) 大诗人也是音律大师。(2) 这是一位不知名的年轻诗人写的。(3) 诗人表达了他对所爱的女子火一般的激情。(4) 他被女王封为桂冠诗人。(5) 诗人在他诗歌中把他的情人比作玫瑰花。

translation: n.毒药；毒害；败坏道德之事vt.毒害；摧毁；中毒adj.有毒的；危险的
examples: (1) We detected traces of the poison in her food.(2) He tried to kill himself by taking poison.(3) Some people say that selfishness is a poison in our society.(4) Someone tried to poison our dog.(5) Spiritual rubbish can poison the children's pure minds.(6) Drugs poison a person's joy in life.(7) Tainted food can poison your system.(8) Nonetheless, an Argentine pathologist who has studied diethylene glycol poisonings helped develop a test for the poison in exhumed bodies.(9) Just as a trader with a small escort and great wealth would avoid a perilous route, or just as one desiring to live avoids poison, even so should one shun evil.
(1) 我们在她的食物里发现了微量毒药。(2) 他曾试图服毒自杀。(3) 有些人说自私是我们社会的一害。(4) 有人想毒杀我们的狗。(5) 精神垃圾能毒害孩子们的纯洁心灵。(6) 麻药危害人生的欢乐。(7) 腐坏的食物会使身体中毒。(8) 尽管如此，来自于阿根廷的病原学家仍然在掘出的尸体中检测出有毒的甘油。(9) 如财多而随从少的富商避开危险的路线，如想要生存之人避免毒药，人们亦应避免邪恶。

translation: adj.有毒的；恶意的
examples: (1) Some mushrooms are poisonous.(2) Some snakes have poisonous fangs.(3) She gave him a poisonous look.
(1) 有些蘑菇有毒。(2) 有些蛇长有毒牙。(3) 她恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

translation: n.杆；柱；极点v.(用杆)支撑Pole.n.波兰人
examples: (1) Pole vaulters need long run-ups.(2) The hut was made of poles covered with grass mats.(3) He had put up a basket on a pole in the back yard.(4) When Scott reached the South Pole he found Amundsen had anticipated him.(5) He flew to Europe via the North Pole.
(1) 撑竿跳需要长距离助跑。(2) 茅屋用木杆搭成，上面以草席覆盖。(3) 他在后院一根柱子上安一个球篮。(4) 当斯科特抵达南极的时候，发现阿蒙森比他到得更早。(5) 他经由北极飞到欧洲。

translation: n.政策；方针n.保险单
examples: (1) They expressed their dissent from official policy.(2) I will never swerve from my declared policy on this matter.(3) This latest incident may be the lever needed to change government policy.(4) This is a constant policy to conduct our steps.(5) It's the company's policy to sacrifice short-term profits for the sake of long-term growth.(6) The annual premium on my policy is 3000 yuan.
(1) 他们对官方的政策表示出异议。(2) 我决不背离我已经宣布的在这个问题上的政策。(3) 最近的事件或许可以作为迫使政府改变政策所需的手段。(4) 这是指导我们行动的一贯方针。(5) 为长期发展而牺牲短期利润是公司的方针。(6) 我的保险单每年的保险费是三千元。

translation: n.光泽；上光剂；优雅；精良v.擦亮；磨光；推敲；完善Polish.adj.波兰的；波兰人的；波兰语的n.波兰语
examples: (1) A hot plate will spoil the polish on this table.(2) This car polish is an effective shield against rust.(3) With this polish you can give a good high gloss to the wood.(4) Now we have a presentable great speaker whose polish reminds me of Will Smith.(5) We want the game we're working on right now to be as high in quality, polish and playability as anything we've done in the past.(6) These well trained and elite troops are well equipped with plate armour and lances, making them a fearsome addition to any Polish army.(7) This chapter introduces the vocalic inventory of Polish.(8) I polished my buttons with a handkerchief.(9) The aluminum film retains its high polish much longer than does silver, and it can be repolished, whereas silver can not.(10) It's an honest book but it hasn't been polished.(11) When I awoke, a Polish man came to my room, held my hand and looked at me with friendly eyes.(12) Well, I think she's either Russian or Polish.(13) This chapter introduces the vocalic inventory of Polish.

(1) 热盘子会毁坏桌面的光泽。(2) 这种汽车上光蜡很有防锈作用。(3) 使用这种上光蜡可使木器表面极为光亮平滑。(4) 现在我们能言善辩的总统，他的优雅一直让我想起了威尔史密斯。(5) 我们希望能够使这款正在开发的游戏像我们曾做过的任何东西一般高质量，精良和具高度可玩性。(6) 这些骑士装备精良板甲和骑枪，是训练有素的精锐骑兵，为波兰军队之杀手镧。(7) 这一章讲了波兰语的元音表。(8) 我用手帕把钮扣擦亮。(9) 铝膜保持高度的光洁的时间比银粉长多了，而且铝膜可以再次磨光，而银粉层却不行。(10) 这本书写得真诚坦率，但还未经润色。(11) 当我醒来时,一名波兰人走过来,他握着我的手,亲切地望着我。(12) 嗯，我看她不是俄罗斯人就是波兰人。(13) 这一章讲了波兰语的元音表。

translation: adj.有礼貌的；客气的；有教养的；文雅的
examples: (1) It is not polite of you to cut the speaker short.(2) This boy is polite to everyone.(3) You may be busy, but you should be polite at least.(4) Don't answer back; it's not polite.(5) She is fond of polite literature.
(1) 你打断发言者的话,真不礼貌。(2) 这个男孩对所有人都很礼貌。(3) 你可能很忙,但无论如何你应客气点。(4) 不要顶嘴, 这样显得你没教养。(5) 她喜爱风雅文学。

translation: adj.政治的；政治上的；政党的；人事的；争权夺利的
examples: (1) He has some pretty strange political ideas.(2) She entered the political arena after her husband's death.(3) The British political system has evolved over several centuries.(4) The program of a political party is a banner.(5) One suspects he was dismissed for political reasons.(6) Everything in our company is so political that you never know who you can trust.
(1) 他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。(2) 她丈夫死后，她进入了政界。(3) 英国的政治制度是经过几个世纪逐步发展而成的。(4) 一个政党的纲领就是一面旗帜。(5) 有人怀疑他是由于人事上的原因而被解职的。(6) 我们公司的所有事情都是争权夺利的,以至于你都知道你能相信谁。

translation: n.政治家；政客
examples: (1) A politician should be a servant of the people.(2) That famous politician was murdered last year.(3) A politician needs the common touch.(4) The politician gave an equivocal answer.(5) The politician cops out on the issue of free trade.(6) Mr. Brown is a highly visible politician.
(1) 政治家应是人民的公仆。(2) 那位著名的政治家去年被谋杀了。(3) 政治家需要有平易近人的美德。(4) 那政客的答复模棱两可。(5) 那政客对自由贸易的问题只是一味逃避。(6) 布朗先生是一位经常公开露面的政客。

translation: n.政治；政治学；政治活动；政治策略；政见
examples: (1) This letter does not pertain to politics.(2) He is not interested in politics.(3) In politics Britain has preferred evolution to revolution.(4) He has serious aspirations to a career in politics.(5) Politics has always interested me.(6) She plays an active part in local politics.(7) We've been having friendly argument on politics.(8) What are your politics?
(1) 这封信的内容与政治无关。(2) 他不喜欢政治。(3) 在政治上，英国喜欢渐进而不喜欢革命。(4) 他有从政的雄心壮志。(5) 我一直对政治学有兴趣。(6) 她积极参与地方政治活动。(7) 我们一直就政治问题进行友好的讨论。(8) 你的政见是什么？

translation: n.污染；污染物
examples: (1) They devised proposals to deal with air pollution.(2) Waste water from the factory is the main cause of the pollution of local rivers.(3) Many young people could not resist the spiritual pollution.(4) The main pollution sources include: slag, sewage water, smoke, and tail gas.
(1) 他们构想出处理空气污染的方案。(2) 来自那家工厂的污水是当地河流污染的主要原因。(3) 很多年轻人不能抵制精神污染。(4) 主要污染物有矿渣，污水，烟气、尾气等。

translation: n.池塘
examples: (1) There are some reeds in the pond.(2) The deer lowered its head to drink from the pond.(3) The farm has a pond from which the cattle can drink.(4) The cattle had trodden a path to the pond.(5) Lotus flowers are in full bloom in the pond in summer.(6) She threw a stone into the pond and watched the ripples spread.
(1) 池塘里有些芦苇。(2) 鹿低下头去喝池塘里的水。(3) 农场有一个供牛饮水的池塘。(4) 牛群踩出了一条通往池塘的小径。(5) 夏季的水塘中，芙蓉盛开。(6) 她把一块石头扔进池塘里,看着水的波纹扩散开。

translation: n.爆米花adj.（无艺术含量或智慧的事物）流行的
examples: (1) I bought a cup of coke and some popcorn.(2) Popcorn is popular with various people.
(1) 我买一杯可口可乐和一些爆米花。(2) 爆米花受到各种人的欢迎。

translation: n.港口
examples: (1) Rick often watched the boats returning to port in the late afternoon.(2) The priest blessed the ship before it left port.
(1) 瑞克常常看到小船在傍晚回到港口。(2) 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。

translation: adj.轻便的；手提式的；[计]可移植的n.便携的东西
examples: (1) The portable device easily knocks down.(2) Portable telephones are very popular nowadays.(3) She traded her roller-skates for Billy's portable radio.(4) The new portable computers are going like hot cakes.
(1) 这种轻便装置容易拆卸。(2) 现今，移动电话非常普及。(3) 她拿旱冰鞋换了比利的手提收音机。(4) 新的便携式计算机卖得很快。

translation: n.搬运工；（列车）服务员；杂务工n.门卫n.黑啤酒Portern.波特(人名)
examples: (1) Did you remember to tip the porter?(2) The porter will carry your luggage to your room.(3) The porter was weighed down by all the luggage.(4) The porter ushered us into the wainitg room.(5) He once worked as porter in a commercial bank.(6) The hotel porter will call a taxi for you.(7) I had forgotten all about Mr. Porter.(8) Porter revealed the true complexity of cell structure.
(1) 你记得给搬运工小费了吗？(2) 搬运工会把你的行李搬到你的房间去的。(3) 搬运工扛着这些行李压得直不起腰来。(4) 服务员把我们引进了候车室。(5) 他曾在一家商业银行当杂务工。(6) 旅馆的门卫可以给你叫计程车。(7) 我已经把波特先生忘得一干二净了。(8) 波特如实地揭示了细胞结构的复杂性。

translation: n.位置；职位；立场；状态vt.安置；定位
examples: (1) Can you find our position on this map?(2) I can tell the time from the position of the sun.(3) He got the position on the strength of his skill in finance.(4) He maintained his position.(5) He refused to back away from his position.(6) The company is in a difficult position now.(7) She positioned herself near the warm fire.(8) The integrated child seat is positioned behind the driver's seat.(9) They position the task by means of radar.(10) Market research can help a company to position its product.
(1) 你能在这幅地图上找到我们的位置吗?(2) 我可以从太阳的位置知道时刻。(3) 他凭著自己的理财本领得到了这个职位。(4) 他坚持他的立场。(5) 他拒绝放弃自己的立场。(6) 这家公司现在正处于困难境况。(7) 她待在温暖的炉子的旁边。(8) 一体化儿童座椅安置在驾驶座后面。(9) 他们用雷达定位任务。(10) 市场调查有助于公司对产品的定位。

translation: vt.拥有；持有；支配
examples: (1) Different workers possess different skills.(2) The police asked me if I possessed a gun.(3) She was possessed by the desire to be rich.
(1) 不同的工作者有不同的技能。(2) 警察问我是否有枪。(3) 她被致富的欲望所支配。

translation: n.拥有；财产；所有；殖民地
examples: (1) He was found in possession of dangerous drugs.(2) We've bought the house, but we can't get possession of it before July.(3) The people had to gather up their few possessions and escaped abroad.(4) The villa is in the mayor's possession.(5) The former colonial possessions are now independent states.
(1) 她被发现藏有危险物品。(2) 我们买下了这所房子, 但要到七月份才算实际拥有。(3) 人们不得不收拾起仅有的一点财物逃到国外去。(4) 那幢别墅属镇长所有。(5) 以前的许多殖民地现已成为独立的国家。

translation: n.可能；可能性；可能的事情；潜在的价值
examples: (1) I see great possibilities in the scheme.(2) We must accept the possibility that we might be wrong.(3) She saw the possibilities of the scheme from the beginning.(4) We can't exclude the possibility that it will rain.(5) She thought of several possibilities.(6) The idea has tremendous possibilities.
(1) 我看这计划很可能成功。(2) 我们必须承认，我们有可能搞错了。(3) 她从一开始就预见到这计划可能成功。(4) 我们不能排除天会下雨的可能性。(5) 她考虑了几种可能的情况。(6) 这个想法极具潜在价值。

translation: n.邮费；邮资已付邮戳
examples: (1) It costs a pound, plus ten pence for postage.(2) What is the postage for an air letter?
(1) 这东西值一镑，另加邮费十便士。(2) 寄一封航空信的邮费要多少？

translation: n.邮箱
examples: (1) There is a postbox at the street corner.
(1) 街角有个邮箱。

translation: n.邮政编码
examples: (1) You need to give me your address and postcode so that I can write to you.
(1) 请把您的地址和邮政编码给我，这样我可以给你写信。

translation: n.海报；装饰画；急行旅人
examples: (1) The lettering on the poster is very eye-catching.(2) He put up a poster advertising the circus.(3) The poster wouldn't stick even though I drenched it with glue.(4) Have you seen their poster?(5) The poster had been ripped to pieces.(6) Her bedroom is covered with posters.(7) There are many posters in the big beautiful city.
(1) 海报上的字体非常醒目。(2) 他贴了一张宣传马戏团的海报。(3) 我涂了大量胶水，可那张海报就是贴不住。(4) 你看到他们的广告牌了吗？(5) 那张广告画已被撕得粉碎。(6) 她的卧室里满是画片。(7) 在这座美丽的大城市有很多急行的旅人。

translation: vt.延期；推迟
examples: (1) The weather being bad, we had to postpone our trip.(2) She did not postpone her departure.(3) Can we postpone the meeting till tomorrow?(4) The commander decided to postpone the big push until the spring.(5) We agree to postpone the shipping date, considering (that) there is no steamer recently.(6) Our financial situation is still precarious if we postpone the release of the new product.
(1) 因为天气不好,我们不得不延期出行。(2) 她不再延迟她的行期。(3) 我们可以把会议延到明天吗?(4) 指挥官决定把大规模的进攻推迟到春天进行。(5) 由于(考虑到)最近无船，我们同意推迟装期。(6) 如果我们推迟发布新产品的话，我们的财政状况仍然岌岌可危。

translation: n.罐；壶；一大笔(钱)；奖杯（尤指银杯）；大麻v.把 ... 装罐；射猎；(台球)入袋
examples: (1) Will you help me to wash up all these pots and pans?(2) She stayed up all night writing the paper with a pot of coffee at her elbow.(3) He has earned a pot of money.
(1) 帮我洗洗这些锅碗瓢盆好吗？(2) 她熬了一整夜写论文,身边放着一壶咖啡。(3) 他赚了一大笔钱。

translation: adj.潜在的；可能的n.潜力；潜能n.电位；电势
examples: (1) These potential effects must be studied carefully.(2) Aha! Now that 's something that has potential .(3) She has acting potential, but she needs training.(4) He hasn't realized his full potential yet.(5) We can only measure the difference between the potentials of two half cells when they are linked to form an electrochemical cell.
(1) 这些潜在的影响必须仔细地加以研究。(2) 啊！ 现在这好像是很有可能的。(3) 她有表演潜力，但需要训练。(4) 他还没有意识到他的全部潜能。(5) 当两个半电池连接形成一个化学电池时,我们仅能测定两个半电池之间电位的差值。

translation: n.粉末；粉；火药；细雪vt.洒粉于；使变成粉；重击vi.变成粉；涂粉
examples: (1) Borax is a kind of white powder.(2) There's too much powder on your nose.(3) I know the smell of powder.(4) Have you ever skied the powder in Utah?(5) I'm just going to powder my nose.(6) Actors powder with their left hands for luck.
(1) 硼砂是一种白色粉末。(2) 你鼻子上的粉擦得太多了。(3) 我上过战场。(4) 你在犹他州滑过雪吗?(5) 我想去补补妆。(6) 演员们为了讨吉利而用左手搽粉。

translation: n.力量；力；能力；权力；【数】幂；电力v.使有力量；给 ... 提供动力adj.电力的；力量的；权力的
examples: (1) A man should rely upon his own power.(2) Such things aren't within the compass of my power.(3) I intend to release my karma to give power away.(4) The powers of the police need to be clearly defined.(5) So you need to power up your lymph system.(6) To power your camera you will need some rechargeable batteries.(7) She's gone to some power lunch to discuss the deal.
(1) 人类应该依靠自身的力量。(2) 这些事不在我力可能及的范围之内。(3) 我意愿释放我送给别人力量的业力。(4) 必须对警方的权限作出明确的规定。(5) 因此你需要增强淋巴系统的功能。(6) 要为你的相机供电，你需要一些可充电电池。(7) 她赴巨头午餐会商讨此事。

translation: adj.强有力的；强大的；有权的；强健的
examples: (1) This defeat was a powerful blow to the enemy.(2) The elephant grinds its food with its powerful molars.(3) Russia used to be a very powerful country.(4) The chancellor is the most powerful man in the Austrian government.
(1) 这次失败是对敌人的有力的打击。(2) 象用其强有力的臼齿嚼碎食物。(3) 俄国曾是一个非常强大的国家。(4) 首相是奥地利政府最有实权的人。

translation: adj.明智的；实际的；实用的；事实上的n.实践考试
examples: (1) A practical person does not spend his money and time foolishly.(2) It's an interesting idea, but there are many practical difficulties.(3) Most importantly, we should develop our own practical ability.(4) Your invention is not practical.(5) His practical at the hospital went well enough.
(1) 一个有头脑的人是不胡乱花钱和虚度光阴的。(2) 这是一个很有意思的想法,然而却存在着许多实际困难。(3) 最重要的是,我们应该提高自身的实践能力。(4) 你的发明不实用。(5) 他在医院的实习进行得相当好。

translation: n.大草原
examples: (1) The prairie is topped occasionally by low hills.(2) A cowboy fell off his horse and broke his leg on the prairie.
(1) 偶尔可见大草原上隆起几座低矮的小山。(2) 一个牛仔在大草原上从马背上摔了下来，摔断了腿。

translation: vt.赞美；称赞n.赞美；称赞；崇拜vi.赞美
examples: (1) The teacher praised her for her courage.(2) The guests praised the meal.(3) He received praise from his colleagues for winning the prize.(4) Offer up praise and adoration to sb.(5) Mankind and womankind both like praise.(6) His heroism was beyond all praise.
(1) 老师赞扬了她的勇气。(2) 客人们称赞这顿饭做得好.(3) 他因获得该奖而受到同事们的称赞。(4) 颂扬并崇拜某人。(5) 男人与女人都喜欢被赞美。(6) 他的英勇行为使人赞美不尽。

translation: v.祈祷；请求；恳求；祈求
examples: (1) She prays to god to keep her son from harm.(2) They went to the mosque to pray.(3) I earnestly pray for your pardon.(4) I pray that you will have pity on my distress.(5) We pray you for mercy/to show mercy.(6) They prayed that their enemies might be defeated.(7) I'll pray to God for your safety.
(1) 她祈祷上帝保佑儿子平安。(2) 他们去清真寺做祷告。(3) 我恳切地请求你原谅。(4) 我请求你可怜可怜我的不幸遭遇。(5) 我们恳求你发慈悲.(6) 他们祈求上苍让敌人失败。(7) 我祈求上帝保你平安。

translation: n.祈祷；祷告；祷文；祈祷者
examples: (1) She had a wakeful night spent in prayer.(2) The congregation in the church knelt in prayer.(3) I say my prayers every night before going to bed.(4) Her prayer answered and her son came home safely.(5) The Brethren hold a prayer meeting every Thursday.(6) She offered up a prayer to God for her husband's safe return.(7) And the whole building rocked with prayer and song.(8) The supreme prayer of my heart is not to be learned, rich, famous, powerful, or "good," but simply to be radiant.
(1) 她整夜祈祷。(2) 教堂的会众跪下来祈祷。(3) 每天晚上上床前，我都要祈祷。(4) 她的祈祷应验了，儿子平安地回到了家。(5) 教友每周四举行一次祷告会。(6) 她向上帝祷告保佑她丈夫平安回来。(7) 整个教堂在祈祷者的歌声中震荡着。(8) 在我心里最虔诚的祈祷者不是博学的，富有的，有影响力的，或者好的，但是是容光焕发的。

translation: adj.宝贵的；珍贵的；矫揉造作的adv.极其n.宝贝，心爱的人
examples: (1) You should make good use of every precious minute to study.(2) That old book is my most precious possession.(3) He is a rather precious young man.(4) Precious few people can afford prices like that.
(1) 你应很好利用宝贵的每一分钟去学习。(2) 那本旧书是我最珍贵的财产。(3) 他是一个惺惺作态的年轻男子。(4) 没有什麽人出得起那个价钱。

translation: adj.精确的；恰好的；准确的；严格的
examples: (1) With the new technique, measurement was claimed to be much more precise.(2) At the precise moment that I put my foot on the step, the bus started.(3) I am not clear about the precise bearing of the word in this passage.(4) Precise employees are highly appreciated in our company.
(1) 有了这种技术,人们断言测量的结果会精确得多。(2) 恰恰就在我登上公共汽车踏板的时候，车子开动了。(3) 我说不准这个字在这段文章里的确切意义是什么。(4) 我们公司十分欣赏工作态度严谨的员工。

translation: v.预言；预报；预知；预测
examples: (1) It is virtually impossible to predict the future accurately.(2) The economists predicted an increase in the rate of inflation.(3) The earthquake had been predicted several months before.(4) It is impossible to predict what will happen.(5) I can predict something with great accuracy.
(1) 精确预言未来的事实际上是办不到的。(2) 经济学家预言通货膨胀率将会增长。(3) 这次地震早在几个月以前就发布了预报。(4) 预知未来的事是不可能的。(5) 我能很准确地预测某事。

translation: n.偏爱；优先；喜爱物；优惠
examples: (1) She has a preference for blue.(2) It's entirely a matter of preference.(3) A polar bear has a preference for cold weather.(4) Her preference in foods is omelets.(5) What is your preference, tea or coffee?(6) We've granted that country special trade preferences.
(1) 她特别喜欢蓝色。(2) 这完全是个见仁见智的问题。(3) 北极熊喜欢寒冷的天气。(4) 她喜爱的食物是煎蛋卷。(5) 咖啡和茶,你最喜欢哪一样？(6) 我们给了那个国家特殊的贸易优惠。

translation: adj.怀孕的；充满的；意味深长的
examples: (1) How long has she been pregnant?(2) She got pregnant and was turned out of the house by her parents.(3) Women who do not ovulate regularly have difficulty in becoming pregnant.(4) He is a man pregnant with ideas.(5) His only reaction was a pregnant silence.(6) His words were followed by a pregnant pause.
(1) 她怀孕多久了？(2) 她怀孕了，父母把她赶出了家门。(3) 妇女排卵期不正常就不易受孕。(4) 他是一个思想丰富的人。(5) 他唯一的反应是一阵意味深长的沉默(6) 他说完话，接着是一段意味深长的停顿。

translation: n.偏见；伤害vt.伤害；使 ... 存偏见；使偏袒
examples: (1) She has a prejudice against modern music.(2) A judge must be free from prejudice.(3) The offer was accepted without prejudice to the current pay negotiations.(4) A new law has been brought in to discourage racial prejudice.(5) We can't do the prejudice of your rights.(6) Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.(7) His pleasant voice and manner prejudiced the jury in his favor.(8) Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.
(1) 她对现代音乐怀有偏见。(2) 法官必须不抱成见。(3) 该提议获得接纳，但对目前正在进行的工资谈判并无影响。(4) 一项反对种族歧视的新法律已被提出。(5) 我们不能做有损你权益的事。(6) 她姿色迷人，因而评委都偏向她。(7) 他那令人愉快的声音和举止使陪审团对他产生了偏心。(8) 她姿色迷人，因而评委都偏向她。

translation: n.总理；首相adj.首位的；第一的；最初的
examples: (1) Premier Zhou is a distinguished politician.(2) The premier deals with important affairs of state.(3) The premiers of the two countries met in Geneva yesterday.(4) His work on the cause of the diseases is of premier importance to the whole world.(5) The company has achieved a premier position in the electronics field.
(1) 周总理是一位卓越的政治家。(2) 总理处理国家重要事务。(3) 两国首相昨天在日内瓦会晤。(4) 他的病理研究工作对全世界至关重要。(5) 该公司执电子行业之牛耳。

translation: n.准备；预备；配制
examples: (1) He didn't do any preparation for this exam, so he failed.(2) Preparations for the Queen's visit are almost complete.(3) The preparation for his cough included camphor.
(1) 他考试前没做任何准备，所以不及格。(2) 女王访问的筹备工作已基本就绪。(3) 为医治他的咳嗽而调制的药中包括樟脑。

translation: v.预备；准备
examples: (1) Early experiments with military rockets prepared the ground for space travel.(2) He is preparing his speech for the meeting tomorrow.(3) Prepare to alight,for we are almost there.(4) Peel the pineapples and I will prepare the pineapple pie.
(1) 早年对军用火箭进行的实验为发展航天技术奠定了基础。(2) 他正准备明天集会的演说。(3) 我们马上就要到了(4) 你把菠萝皮削了,我来准备菠萝派。

translation: n.处方；药方；对策
examples: (1) The doctor is writing a prescription.(2) The doctor dispensed a prescription to his patient.(3) The prescription of drugs is a doctor's responsibility.(4) His prescription for economic recovery was not well received.
(1) 医生正在开处方。(2) 医生开处方给病人配药。(3) 开药方是医生的职责。(4) 他为经济复苏提出的对策反应不佳。

translation: n.介绍；陈述；赠送物；报告；[美]讲课
examples: (1) Amy did her presentation on her cat.(2) We want to make her a presentation to celebrate her jubilee.(3) I have to make a big presentation in the meeting.(4) He gave a presentation on drug abuse.
(1) 艾米做的介绍是关于她的猫的。(2) 我们想送她一件礼物以庆贺她的纪念日。(3) 我必须在会议中作重要报告。(4) 他开办了一场关于毒品滥用的讲座。

translation: v.保护；保存；保持n.禁猎区；蜜饯
examples: (1) It is highly important to preserve the environment.(2) It's the duty of the police to preserve the public order.(3) You should preserve your papers for future use.(4) I tried to preserve my independence.(5) No hunting is allowed in the preserve .(6) Mother made some preserves.
(1) 保护自然环境至关重要。(2) 维护公共秩序是警察的职责。(3) 你应当把你的文件保存起来以备将来之用。(4) 我试图保持自己的独立性。(5) 在禁猎区内不许打猎。(6) 母亲做了一些蜜饯。

translation: n.(国家)总统；(公司)总裁；校长；总经理；社长
examples: (1) The president gave the Prince and his attendants a farewell banquet.(2) She was exalted to the position of president.(3) The president has just come to see me.(4) When the president of the company retired, the vice-president was elevated to his position.(5) I'll have you know that I was president of the ski club in my college days.
(1) 总统为王子和他的随员举行了告别宴会。(2) 她被提升为校长。(3) 校长刚才来看我来了。(4) 该公司的总经理退休时,副总经理被提升为总经理。(5) 我告诉你,我在大学时代是滑雪社的社长。

translation: n.压强；压力；压迫v.施压
examples: (1) My father suffers from high blood pressure.(2) The pressure of work was too great for him.(3) He works well under pressure.(4) The native bankers grew weaker under pressure from the bureaucrats.(5) Now you are trying to pressure me.(6) Don't be pressured into making any rash decisions.
(1) 我父亲有高血压。(2) 工作的压力使他承受不了。(3) 他在有压力的情况下工作很出色。(4) 由于官僚势力的压迫，民族银行资本家的力量不断削弱。(5) 你现在试图向我施压。(6) 不要在施压下做出轻率的决定。

translation: v.假装；装作；自以为
examples: (1) She pretends that she likes them so that she can get their help.(2) The young actor pretended to be Hamlet.(3) She closed her eyes and pretended to be asleep.(4) Surely he doesn't pretend to any understanding of music!
(1) 她假装很喜欢他们，借以获得他们的帮助。(2) 那个年轻演员扮演哈姆雷特。(3) 她闭上眼睛,装作睡着了。(4) 谅他不会自以为懂得什麽音乐吧！

translation: n.预审；试映；预习；预告vt.事先查看；预习
examples: (1) They sent the recording for our preview.(2) After a sneak preview of the film they decided to shelve it.(3) Please do the preview and review work.(4) And some Japanese who saw the preview were pleasantly surprised.(5) You may also preview and buy my work here.(6) I can paginate, preview and print my work.(7) Please preview the text before next class.(8) It's required for every high school students to preview the lessons before class.
(1) 他们把那录音送来给我们预先审查。(2) 该影片在试映后，他们决定把它搁置起来。(3) 请做好预习和复习工作。(4) 一些日本人在看过电影预告后大表惊艳。(5) 你也可以在这里查看与购买我的作品。(6) 打印材料时，我会先标上页码，预览后再打印。(7) 下次来上课之前请预习课文。(8) 课前预习功课是每位高中学生必须做的。

translation: n.骄傲；自豪；自尊心；引以自豪的东西vt.以 ... 自豪
examples: (1) My teaching is my pride and joy.(2) Pride was his downfall.(3) She takes great pride in her children's success.(4) He looked at his children with evident pride.(5) Having to accept the money was a blow to her pride.(6) I think you hurt his pride by laughing at the way he speaks English.(7) The new car was the pride of the whole family.(8) He prides himself on remaining calm in an emergency.
(1) 我的教学工作是我的快乐和骄傲。(2) 骄傲是他垮台的原因。(3) 她为自己的孩子取得的成绩感到无比骄傲。(4) 他看着自己的孩子,充满自豪。(5) 她不得不接受这笔钱，这是对她自尊心的打击。(6) 我觉得你嘲笑他说英语的方式刺伤了他的自尊心。(7) 新汽车是全家人引以自豪之物。(8) 他在紧急关头十分镇静为此感到骄傲。

translation: adj.首要的；主要的；初级的；初等教育的；根本的；初期的n.第一位；初选；最主要者；要素；原色；初级线圈
examples: (1) The primary task for socialism is to develop the productive forces.(2) Another primary reason is that there seems to be too many private cars and not enough public buses.(3) The demand for primary products is on the increase in European market.(4) Primary education comes under the umbrella of local government.(5) This is the primary source from which human knowledge develops.(6) A primary disease arises spontaneously with no apparent external symptoms.(7) We should place development on the primary in governing and rejuvenating the country.(8) Collins was nosed out by his opponent in the primary.(9) Nowadays, technology has become the primary factor in the economy development and many people begin to question Marx's theory on labor value.(10) These are created by combining the primary colors.(11) "(actors, singers, etc.) perform for outside salary income without approval by the unit they belong to"(12) In one way, primary and secondary coils are wound around the space.(13) An electric transformer changes the alternating voltage applied to it in proportion to the numbers of turns in its primary and secondary windings.

(1) 社会主义的首要任务是发展社会生产力。(2) 另一个主要原因是私家车过多而公交车不够。(3) 欧洲市场对初级产品的需求在增长。(4) 小学教育受地方政府的保护。(5) 这是人类认识发展的根源。(6) 处于初期阶段的疾病发生时没有明显的外在症状。(7) 我们应将发展放在执政兴国中的第一位。(8) 柯林斯在初选中就被他的对手击败了。(9) 摘要当今世界，科技已成为推动经济的第一要素，不少人开始对马克思的劳动价值论提出质疑。(10) 这些颜色通过混合原色形成。(11) 走穴(12) 有一种方法是把初级线圈和次级线圈绕在这个地方。(13) 变压器其交变电压的改变与初级线圈及其次级线圈的匝数成正比。

translation: 小学
examples: (1) Sure. We are friends since primary school.(2) The little boy left primary school at eleven.
(1) 当然，我们从小学就是朋友了。(2) 这个小男孩十一岁时小学毕业。

translation: adj.原始的；简陋的n.文艺复兴前的艺术家；原始人
examples: (1) Primitive peoples deified the sun.(2) The constitution of a primitive society is not necessarily simple.(3) They built a primitive shelter out of the tree trunks(4) Primitive people often lived in caves.
(1) 原始部落将太阳奉为神。(2) 原始社会的结构并不一定就是简单的。(3) 他们用一些树干建造了一个简陋的棚子。(4) 原始人常常住在山洞里。

translation: n.原理；原则；主义；信念
examples: (1) A bicycle and a motorcycle are built on the same principle.(2) Archimedes ,a great physicist ,discovered the principle of floating bodies .(3) We adhere to the principle that everyone should be treated fairly.(4) It is easier to fight for one's principle than to live up to them.(5) He refused to attend the meeting on principle.
(1) 自行车和摩托车是根据同样的原理制造的。(2) 阿基米德，一位伟大的物理学家，发现了浮体原理。(3) 我们坚持人人都应该被平等对待这一原则。(4) 为自己的主义斗争，要比他们施诸实践更容易。(5) 他出于信念拒绝参加这次会议。

translation: n.印刷；印刷术动词print的现在分词.
examples: (1) The printing ink has been used up.(2) Don't worry about the printing; that's my parish.(3) Mass literacy was only possible after the invention of printing.(4) Printing was introduced to Europe from China.
(1) 印刷油墨用光了。(2) 别担心打印的事，那是我的工作范围。(3) 发明了印刷术后文化教育才得以普及。(4) 印刷术是从中国传入欧洲的.

translation: n.监狱；监禁vt.囚禁；关入监狱
examples: (1) The police crushed out the rebellion in the prison.(2) That felon tried to escape from the prison.(3) His deliverance from the prison puzzled us.(4) Strikes by prison officers underline the need for reform in our gaols.(5) The thief was put into prison for one year.(6) Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.(7) She continues to languish in a foreign prison.(8) He has been kept in prison for weeks without food and dies like a dog.
(1) 警察把发生在监狱中的暴乱镇压了下去。(2) 那名重罪犯试图从监狱中逃跑。(3) 他被从监狱释放使我们困惑不已。(4) 监狱工作人员罢工一事，突出地表明我们的监狱制度需要改革。(5) 小偷被监禁一年。(6) 许多人都相信监禁解决不了犯罪问题。(7) 她被继续囚禁在一所外国的监狱里。(8) 他被囚禁了几星期，没有食物果腹，最後悲惨地死去。

translation: n.囚犯
examples: (1) The prisoner made a plea for mercy.
(1) 囚犯恳求宽恕。

translation: adj.私人的；个人的；私下的；私有的；缄默的n.士兵；列兵
examples: (1) The president is paying a private visit to Europe.(2) We each have our private views about it.(3) The public is fascinated by the private lives of public figures.(4) She is a very retiring and private person.(5) Dr.Kraemer,a former lawyer,was also a private in World WarⅠ.(6) Soldiers are classified as Private, Specialist Sergeant and Master Sergeant.
(1) 总统正在欧洲进行私人访问。(2) 我们每个人对这件事都有自己的看法。(3) 公众对社会名流的私生活具有浓厚的兴趣。(4) 她是个非常孤独缄默的人。(5) 克雷默博士以前当过律师,一战时也是个士兵。(6) 士兵分为列兵、专业军士、军士长。

translation: n.特权；荣幸；特别恩典；基本人权vt.给特权；免除
examples: (1) I had the privilege of meeting the queen.(2) It is a great privilege to know you.(3) It was a privilege to work with him.(4) Kings cannot privilege what God forbade.
(1) 我有会见王后的特权。(2) 认识你是一件难得的事。(3) 和他在一起工作是一项殊荣。(4) 国王不能原谅上帝不允许做的事。

translation: adj.很可能的n.很可能的事
examples: (1) The most probable discipline for its use is chemical engineering, but it can also be used in materials science, fuels science, and chemistry programs.(2) The most probable discipline for its use is chemical engineering, but it can also be used in materials science, fuels science, and chemistry programs.
(1) 它的使用的最很可能的纪律是化学工程，但是它也能被在材料科学，燃料科学和化学计画方面使用。(2) 它的使用的最很可能的纪律是化学工程，但是它也能被在材料科学，燃料科学和化学计画方面使用。

translation: n.程序；手续；步骤
examples: (1) These procedures are highly irregular.(2) What's the procedure for opening a savings account?(3) The next procedure is to insert the battery.
(1) 这些程序是很不合乎规则的。(2) 开一个储蓄帐户有什么手续?(3) 接下来的步骤是装进电池。

translation: n.工序；过程v.加工；处理；起诉；列队前进
examples: (1) Building a car is a long process.(2) Growth and decay are vital processes.(3) Brazil began importing soybeans to process at home.(4) The computer helps us to process reservation rapidly.(5) Orders are starting to backlog faster than we can process them.(6) The district attorney processed against the defaulting debtor.(7) The visitors processed into the house.(8) The bishops, priests and deacons processed into the cathedral.
(1) 制造一辆小汽车有很长的工序。(2) 生长和衰亡是生命过程。(3) 巴西开始进口大豆在国内加工。(4) 计算机帮助我们迅速处理预定。(5) 订单开始形成积压,我们来不及处理。(6) 地方检查官起诉不履行债务的债务人。(7) 参观者列队走进这房子里。(8) 主教、 司铎以及助祭列队走进大教堂。

translation: n.产品；产物；结果；某种影响下产生的人或物；乘积
examples: (1) If our product is properly marketed, it shall sell very well.(2) The hand is not only the organ of labour, it is also the product of labour.(3) The eastern frontier of France was the product of centuries of historical accidents.(4) They are the products of post-war affluence.(5) The product of 21 and 16 is 336.
(1) 如果我们的产品适当加以推销,销路应该很好。(2) 手不仅是劳动的器官,它还是劳动的产物。(3) 法国东部的边境是百年来历史上风云变幻的结果。(4) 他们是战後富裕生活的产儿。(5) 21和16的乘积是336。

translation: n.生产；产量；作品；成果；分泌；制作；上映；播出
examples: (1) We must increase production levels.(2) The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.(3) If we cannot sell more goods, we'll have to cut back on the production.(4) This book on education is his latest production.(5) Chapter five is the conclusion .In this part , research production is summarized.(6) The company entered into motion picture production in1897.
(1) 我们必须提高生产水平。(2) 战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。(3) 如果我们不能卖出更多的货物,就必须降低产量。(4) 这本论述教育的书是他的最新作品。(5) 第五章是文章的结论部分，主要对前面的研究成果进行了总结。(6) 这个公司在1897年就开始电影制作工作了。

translation: n.职业；声明；行业；信仰
examples: (1) Nursing is a vocation as well as a profession.(2) I don't believe her profession of friendship for us.(3) He is a leading member of the medical profession.(4) The legal profession has always resisted change.(5) That's why our profession of faith is hollow if we are not caring for our own family.
(1) 护理工作既是职业又是救死扶伤的责任。(2) 我不相信她声称同我们友好。(3) 他是医疗业中首屈一指的医生。(4) 法律界人士对变革总是加以抵制。(5) 那就是说明了，如果我们不眷顾我们家里的人，我们的信仰告白就是空的。

translation: n.教授；老师
examples: (1) Our professor is a man of profound learning.(2) The professor invited his students to his home for conversation.(3) Professor Green, lately of Princeton, is now head of the department at California.(4) I'd like you to meet my geography professor.
(1) 我们的教授是一个学识渊博的人。(2) 教授邀请学生们到自己家里会晤。(3) 格林教授不久前在普林斯顿任教，现在是加州大学的系主任。(4) 我想介绍我的地理老师给你认识。

translation: n.利润；收益；利益vi.得益；获利vt.有益于
examples: (1) There is very little profit in selling newspapers at present.(2) I want to know the net profit.(3) It is well known that fake and inferior commodities do harm to the profit of consumers.(4) We profit from the work of the specialist.(5) He learned to profit by his mistakes.(6) Knowing what you know and profit from it.(7) All his wealth did not profit him.
(1) 现在卖报纸利润很少。(2) 我想知道净收益。(3) 众所周知,假冒伪劣商品损害了消费者的利益。(4) 我们从专家的工作中得到益处。(5) 他学会了从自己的错误中获益。(6) 知道自己知道什么,并从中获利。(7) 他所有的财富于他无益。

translation: n.方案；（活动的）程序；节目；规划；课程；（机器工作的）程序v.计划；培养；编程；制作节目；预设
examples: (1) The government has initiated a programme of economic reform.(2) We now have a new Quality Assurance programme.(3) The news programme overran the allotted time.(4) The purpose of the programme is primarily educational.(5) The school building programme postulates an increase in educational investment.(6) The programme will continue in the coming school year.(7) You haven't been paying attention to the programme.(8) Human beings are genetically programmed to learn certain kinds of language.(9) You can programme it to do different tasks at specific times.(10) The video is programmed to switch on at ten o'clock.

(1) 政府已开始实施经济改革方案。(2) 我们现在用的是一套新的质保程序。(3) 新闻节目超出了规定的时间。(4) 演出该节目的主要目的是为了进行教育。(5) 修建校舍的规划是在增加教育经费的前提下拟定的。(6) 该课程会在新学年续办。(7) 你刚才一直没有注意这个程序。(8) 人类生来有学习某几种语言的遗传因素。(9) 你可以使它在特定时间按计划完成各项不同的任务。(10) 电视机设定在10点钟自动打开。

translation: vt.禁止；妨碍
examples: (1) Smoking is prohibited here.(2) We should prohibit the sale of pornographic literature.(3) Some areas prohibit dogs or require them to be on a leash at all times.(4) Rainy weather and fog prohibited flying.(5) I fear that a prior engagement will prohibit me from joining you in dinner.
(1) 这里禁止吸烟。(2) 我们应该禁止出售淫秽文学。(3) 一些区域禁止狗或者要求一直拴住它们。(4) 雨天和大雾妨碍了飞行。(5) 有约在先，我恐怕不能与你共进晚餐。

translation: n.计划；工程；项目；课题；专题研究；住房工程v.计划；预计；设计；放映；投射；表达；突出；投掷
examples: (1) Our project was scrubbed.(2) They doubted of the feasibility of the project.(3) The project is proceeding as planned.(4) We are discussing the project to establish a new national park(5) We launched a new project.(6) This research project is of great worth.(7) I'm doing a project on Chinese history.(8) The final term will be devoted to project work.(9) The government projected a tax decrease.(10) Our projected visit had to be cancelled.(11) The unemployment rate has been projected to fall.(12) The engineers projected a new machine.(13) The film was projected onto the screen.(14) Images are projected onto the retina of the eye.(15) The campaign has tried to project a view of the party that is acceptable to the most people.(16) His ears project noticeably.(17) Candidates try to project a strong leadership image.(18) An actor must learn to project (his voice).

(1) 我们的计划被取消了。(2) 他们怀疑这个计划的可行性。(3) 工程正在按计划进行。(4) 我们正在讨论建立一个新的国家公园的工程。(5) 我们开始从事一个新项目。(6) 这一研究项目很有价值。(7) 我正在做一个有关中国历史的研究课题。(8) 最后一学期的时间将全部用于专题研究。(9) 政府计划降低税收。(10) 我们计划中的访问不得不取消。(11) 据预测失业率将下降。(12) 工程师们设计一台新机器。(13) 电影放映在银幕上。(14) 影像被投射到眼睛的视网膜上。(15) 竞选游说团试图表达一个让大多数人易于接受的党派观点。(16) 他的耳朵明显突出。(17) 候选人都尽力突出表现一种强有力的领导的形象。(18) 演员必须学习（使声音）扩及远处的发声法.

translation: n.诺言；预示；约定；(有)希望v.允诺；发誓；答应；有希望
examples: (1) Once he made a promise, he would stick to it.(2) I have committed myself and must keep my promise.(3) I don't trust his promise to come for a visit.(4) For her family, life seemed to have no promise.(5) I promise never to reveal his secret.(6) I promise never to lie to you from now on.(7) I promise to return your bicycle on good condition.(8) Dropping ears of rice promise another good harvest.
(1) 他一旦许下诺言,就坚守这个诺言。(2) 我已经作出了承诺,必须信守我的诺言。(3) 我不相信他会如约前来访问。(4) 对她家而言,生活没有任何希望。(5) 我答应决不泄漏他的秘密。(6) 我发誓从今以后再也不向你说谎话。(7) 我答应一定完好无损地还你的自行车。(8) 沈甸甸的稻穗预示著又一次丰收。

translation: vt.促进；提升；升迁；发起；促销，推销
examples: (1) They discussed how to promote cooperation between the two countries.(2) He has been promoted to general manager.(3) He failed to get promoted for lack of resolution.(4) He promoted a campaign to remind the public of protecting the wildlife.
(1) 他们讨论如何促进两国间的合作。(2) 他已被提升为总经理。(3) 他因缺乏果断力而未能得到升迁。(4) 他发起了一项旨在提醒人们保护野生动物的活动。

translation: vt.发音；宣告；宣判；断言vi.发音；发表意见
examples: (1) I don't know how to pronounce this word.(2) People pronounce the word differently in this part of the country.(3) The doctors pronounced that he was no longer in danger.(4) The court pronounced her innocent of all charges.(5) The general pronounced that the fortress was impregnable.(6) He has every right to pronounce on this matter.
(1) 我不知道这个单词怎么发音。(2) 在国内这一地区，这个单词的发音不同。(3) 医生宣称他已脱离危险。(4) 法庭宣判所有的对她指控撤销。(5) 将军断言那座要塞是攻不下的。(6) 他完全有权利对这件事发表意见。

translation: n.发音；读音
examples: (1) His pronunciation is simply terrible.(2) Your faults of pronunciation can be remedied.(3) He learns pronunciation by imitating the teacher.(4) He forgot the pronunciation of this word.(5) You should look up the right pronunciation of this word in the dictionary.
(1) 他的发音太糟了。(2) 你的发音毛病是可以纠正的。(3) 他是向老师模仿来学习发音的。(4) 他把这个字的读音忘了。(5) 你应该查字典找出这个单词的正确读音。

translation: adj.合适的；正当的；真正的
examples: (1) He could not come up with a proper answer.(2) It's not proper for you to catch him up very short.(3) The company does not take proper fire precaution.(4) She hadn't had a proper holiday for years.
(1) 他想不出一个合适的回答。(2) 你突然打断他的话是不恰当的。(3) 公司未采取正当的防火措施。(4) 多年来她都没有过真正的假期。

translation: adv.适当地；正确地；完全地
examples: (1) He has disposed of the rubbish properly.(2) The heater in my car doesn't work properly.(3) The allegations were never properly investigated.
(1) 他已经适当地处理了垃圾。(2) 我汽车里的暖气设备出了点毛病。(3) 指控永远不会被彻底调查。

translation: n.保护；防卫
examples: (1) He's devoted his whole life to the protection of the rare animals.(2) She put on dark glasses as a protection against the strong light.(3) She subscribes to an animal protection society.(4) They lobbied on the environmental protection issue.(5) The settlers banded together for protection.
(1) 他终生献身于珍稀动物的保护。(2) 她戴上墨镜以防强光的照射。(3) 她捐款给一个动物保护协会。(4) 他们就环境保护问题在议员中进行了游说。(5) 移民联合起来保护自己。

translation: v.证明；检验；结果是；发酵
examples: (1) There wasn't enough evidence to prove him guilty.(2) He has proved his courage in the battle.(3) Leave the dough to prove for half an hour.(4) She may prove to be the most suitable person for the job.(5) The old methods proved best after all.(6) Leave the dough to prove for half an hour.
(1) 没有充分的证据证明他有罪。(2) 他已在这场战斗中证明了自己的勇气。(3) 让面团发酵半小时。(4) 她结果可能是最适合干这工作的人。(5) 采用老方法结果反而是某事物最好。(6) 让面团发酵半小时。

translation: n.心理；心理学
examples: (1) I can't understand that man's psychology.(2) She had no personal life and no private psychology.(3) Many people failed in the psychology test.(4) This is fluky psychology, also be pure belong to accidental.(5) Displeased that he assumes surface, in fact the pleased ground of psychology.(6) The national psychology greatly bars the cooperation of the two countries.(7) I am always interested in psychology.(8) She had an undergraduate degree in psychology.(9) My major is linguistic psychology.(10) She is the dean of the psychology department.
(1) 我无法理解那个人的心理。(2) 她没有个人的生活和隐秘的心理活动。(3) 很多人在心理测试环节被淘汰。(4) 这是侥幸心理，亦是纯属偶然。(5) 他表面装出不乐意,其实心理美滋滋地。(6) 民族的心理因素大大阻碍了这两个民族的合作。(7) 我一直对心理学感兴趣。(8) 她有心理学的学士学位。(9) 我的专业是语言心理学。(10) 她是心理学系的系主任。

translation: n.酒吧；酒馆
examples: (1) I ran into an old friend in a pub.(2) We make our ritual visit to the pub.(3) I passed the pub on my way to the library.(4) There is a dreadful shindy in the pub last night.
(1) 我在酒吧碰到了一位老朋友。(2) 我们照例去了酒吧。(3) 我在去图书馆的路上经过了那个酒馆。(4) 昨天晚上酒馆里有人大打出手。

translation: adv.公开地；公然地；以公众名义
examples: (1) Extra shares of common will be sold publicly.(2) The list will be announced publicly.(3) Artists, writers, composers, and others publicly condemned the structure as monstrosity.
(1) 额外的普通股份将公开出售。(2) 名单将会公开宣读。(3) 艺术家、作家、作曲家等人公然把该建筑指责为巨型怪物。

translation: v.出版；发行；公开发表
examples: (1) Her book was published last year.(2) Oxford University Press will publish a new magazine.(3) Prime minister will publish the broadcasting speech this evening.(4) Only in 1687 did he at last publish his new theory.
(1) 她的书去年出版了。(2) 牛津大学出版社将发行新杂志。(3) 首相将于今晚发表广播演说。(4) 终于在一六八七年他发表了他的新理论。

translation: n.脉搏；脉冲；[植]豆类v.搏动；跳动
examples: (1) His pulse is not very regular.(2) The excitement quickened my pulse.(3) I could feel a fluttering pulse.(4) The machine emits sound pulses.(5) I could feel blood pulsing through my veins.(6) He is now used to the life pulsing through a great city(7) His heart began to pulse faster.
(1) 他的脉搏不很规则。(2) 激动使我的心跳加快。(3) 我感到脉搏跳动。(4) 这台机器可发出声脉冲信号。(5) 我感到浑身血液在沸腾。(6) 他现在习惯了大都市里紧张繁忙的生活。(7) 他的心开始加快地跳动起来。

translation: n.泵；抽水机；打气筒；抽水；打气v.打气；唧筒般运动；灌输；抽取；增加；盘问
examples: (1) The heart has acted as a strong pump.(2) At the farm there was an old-fashioned pump for drawing water from a well.(3) Can you lend me your bicycle pump?(4) After several pumps, the water began to flow.(5) She blow up the flat tyre with a bicycle pump.(6) Pump the tire up hard before going out on the road.(7) His heart was pumping fast.(8) It's hard work to pump facts into unwilling students.(9) It is autumn and they are pumping water out of the swimming pool.(10) They have cut prices in an attempt to pump up sales.
(1) 心脏充当了一部强有力的泵。(2) 那个农场有一台老式的用来从井里抽水的抽水机。(3) 能把你的打气筒借给我吗？(4) 用泵抽了几下之后,水流出来了。(5) 她用自行车打气筒给瘪了的轮胎打气。(6) 在出去上路之前, 要把轮胎打足气。(7) 他的心脏跳动得很快。(8) 向不自觉的学生灌输知识并非易事。(9) 入秋了, 他们正在抽游泳池的水。(10) 为了增加销售量他们减价销售。

translation: adj.准时的；严守时刻的；正点的
examples: (1) My cat makes a punctual appearance at mealtimes.(2) Please be punctual in futurity.(3) He likes his guests to be punctual.(4) Not being punctual is his greatest shortcoming.(5) The Chinese are always punctual.(6) He's very punctual always arrives on the dot.
(1) 我的猫一到用餐时间就会准时出现。(2) 今后请准时。(3) 他喜欢客人守时。(4) 不守时间是他的最大缺点。(5) 中国人历来是十分守时的。(6) 他很守时--总是按时到。

translation: v.加标点于；强调；不时打断
examples: (1) The transcription of his speech must be punctuated.(2) The children have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.(3) He made gestures to punctuate his speech.(4) The announcement was punctuated by cheers from the crowd.(5) He punctuated his remarks with thumps on the table.
(1) 他的讲话文本得加上标点符号。(2) 这些小学生尚未学会正确使用标点符号。(3) 他打手势来强调他的讲话。(4) 在宣布过程中，群众的欢呼声此起彼伏。(5) 他讲话时不时地捶着桌子。

translation: n.标点；强调
examples: (1) Beginners should learn the punctuation well.(2) Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.(3) Our teacher has a bee in his bonnet about punctuation.(4) Now, let's begin to learn punctuation.
(1) 初学者应该把标点学好。(2) 我们的老师对标点符号非常重视。(3) 我们的老师没完没了地琢磨著标点符号。(4) 那么，我们开始学习标点。

translation: vt.惩罚；粗暴对待vi.处罚
examples: (1) The teacher blazoned she would punish the bad student.(2) Their teacher punished them for their rudeness.(3) Dangerous driving should be severely punished.(4) The teacher warned them that she would punish anyone who stepped out of line.(5) She was always reluctant to punish her opponent.(6) I have a mind to punish you for stealing a cookie.(7) We wonder whom the teacher is going to punish.
(1) 老师宣布她将惩罚那个坏学生。(2) 老师因为他们态度粗鲁而责罚他们。(3) 危险驾驶应受严惩。(4) 老师警告他们说谁要不守规矩就罚谁。(5) 她总是不情愿地粗暴对待她的对手。(6) 我有意要处罚你偷饼干。(7) 我们极想知道老师要处罚谁。

translation: n.惩罚
examples: (1) He has received a just punishment.(2) Punishment had very little effect on him.
(1) 他已受到应得的惩罚。(2) 惩罚对他没有什么效果。

translation: vt.购买n.购买；购买的物品
examples: (1) She purchased a number of shares in the company.(2) Tickets must be purchased two weeks in advance.(3) The receipt is your proof of purchase.(4) The house is the most expensive purchase I have ever made.
(1) 她在公司里买了一些股票。(2) 票必须提前两周买。(3) 这张发票是你购物的凭据.(4) 房子是我买过的最贵的东西。

translation: adj.纯的；纯洁的；纯粹的
examples: (1) Water can be made pure by distilling it.(2) They are all made of one-hundred percent pure silk.(3) Life is a sweet thing for one who has a pure conscience.(4) It's pure nonsense.(5) They met each other by pure accident.
(1) 水可以通过蒸馏而提纯。(2) 它们都是用100%的纯丝绸做成的。(3) 对于善良纯洁的人来说,生活是一件美好的事情。(4) 那是一派胡言。(5) 他们相见纯属偶然。

translation: n.目的；决心；意图；议题v.打算；决意
examples: (1) What is the purpose of your visit?(2) He was a man of purpose.(3) What is the purpose of this meeting?(4) He purposed to visit South America.(5) We purpose making another trial / to make another trial.(6) I purpose that next year I will go to Hong Kong .
(1) 你来访的目的是什么？(2) 他是一个意志坚强的人(3) 这次会议的议题是什么？(4) 他计划去南美。(5) 我们打算再试一下。(6) 我意欲明年去香港。

translation: n.难题；谜；迷惑；拼图游戏vt.使为难；使困惑vi.苦思；迷惑
examples: (1) Will you help me to solve this puzzle?(2) He sat frowning over a crossword puzzle.(3) Her decision was a puzzle to him.(4) She could not get the puzzle out of her mind.(5) He is in a puzzle about the matter.(6) The question puzzled me.(7) I've never been able to puzzle her out.(8) I have in mind some doubts which really puzzle me.(9) I saw him puzzle over a math problem.(10) She listened with a puzzled expression on her face.
(1) 你能帮助我解决这个难题吗?(2) 他坐着皱着眉头在思考纵横字谜。(3) 她的决定对他来说是个谜。(4) 她无法解开心中的疑虑。(5) 他对这件事大惑不解。(6) 这个问题把我难住了。(7) 我一直对她捉摸不透。(8) 我心中有一个疑团, 百思不得其解。(9) 我看见他正在苦心思索一道数学题。(10) 她脸上带著困惑的表情在倾听。

translation: adj.困惑的；迷惑的动词puzzle的过去式和过去分词.
examples: (1) She listened with a puzzled expression on her face.(2) Due to their puzzling nightmares the villagers have felt puzzled recently.(3) He looked at my puzzled expression.(4) The puzzled look on his face made us puzzling.
(1) 她脸上带著困惑的表情在倾听。(2) 因为困惑的梦魇，村民们最近都感觉疑惑。(3) 他看我迷惑的表情。(4) 他脸上迷惑的样子令我们感到迷惑。

translation: n.金字塔；棱锥体；[证券]金字塔式交易法v.急速增加；以金字塔的模型构建
examples: (1) Egypt is famous for its grand pyramid.(2) Lagrange is the lofty pyramid of mathematical sciences.(3) A pyramid provides a useful conceptual model for organizing scientific knowledge.
(1) 埃及以巨大的金字塔闻名。(2) 拉格朗日是数学科学中高耸的金字塔。(3) 金字塔给科学知识的组织提供了一个有用的概念性模型。

translation: 铅笔刀
examples: (1) He filled his writing case with all kinds of stationery, even including a pencil sharpener.
(1) 他的笔袋里装着各种文具，连铅笔刀都带来了。

translation: n. 包装；一群；背包；包裹；一副vt. 包装；压紧；捆扎；挑选；塞满vi. 挤；包装货物；被包装；群集n. (Pack)人名；(英、德)帕克
examples: The hare could find no safety, a pack of jackals had it in the wind.He rounded on journalists, calling them 'a pack of vultures'.A pack of cards has been spread on the table.Try to pair this card with one exactly the same from the other pack.The traveler took out a bottle of water from the pack on his back.To carry care to bed is to sleep with a pack on your back.He paid $4 for a pack of cigarettes.In order to avoid any possible damage in transit, we would ask you to pack the goods in strong but small wooden cases.Please don't crease the blouse when you pack it.He was told by the boss to pack up.This case is full, I can't pack any more clothes in.I want to go to Shanghai,so I pack my luggage.I crawled into my tent to pack my things up.
