野兔无处逃生,一群豺狗在追踪它。他突然对记者们大发雷霆，称他们是一帮贪婪的家伙。一副牌在桌被传播了。设法从另一副牌中取出一张和这张完全一样的牌。那位旅行者从他的背包中拿出了一瓶水。带着担忧上床睡觉,就彷佛是躺在包裹上睡觉。他花了4美元买了包烟。为避免运送过程中的任何损坏,我方希望贵方用牢固且小巧的木箱来包装这些货物。包装时请不要将衬衫弄绉了。老板把他解雇了。这箱子已装满, 我塞不进更多的衣服。我要去上海我爬进帐篷去收拾我的东西。

translation: n. 页；记录；大事件，时期；男侍者vt. 给…标页码vi. 翻书页，浏览n. (Page)人名；(西)帕赫；(英)佩奇；(意)帕杰；(法)帕日
examples: There are several faults in the page of figures.Open your German readers at page 28.The page number is shown at the foot of the page.When the book is ready for printing,someone has to page it up.He tore the sheet in his hurry to turn over the page.Absorbed, she licked her index finger absently each time she turned a page.
那一页的数字中有几个差错。把德语课本翻到第28页。在页脚处可以看到页码。书在付印前，必须有人排好页码。他匆忙翻页的时候，把杂志都撕坏了。她读得出神，每次翻页就不自觉地舔一下食指。

translation: n. 疼痛；努力vt. 使…痛苦；使…烦恼vi. 感到疼痛；引起疼痛n. (Pain)人名；(意)帕因；(俄)派因；(法)潘；(英)佩因
examples: His leg was broken and he suffered great pain.He has a pain in the knee.He spares no efforts to study English.She's been complaining again she's a real pain!She's pained by her son's conduct.His feet seem to be insensitive to pain.Weeping is a normal response to pain.
他的腿断了,遭受了巨大痛苦的折磨。他膝盖酸痛。他不辞劳苦地学习英语。她又发牢骚了－－真烦人！她对儿子的行为感到痛心。他的脚好像没有疼痛感。哭泣是痛苦的正常反应.

translation: adj. 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的
examples: It was painful for him to renounce his son.His wife's death left a painful void in his life.The sting of a jellyfish is very painful.The operation was very painful.He gained the medal through his painful travail.It was painful to admit that I was wrong.
宣布与儿子脱离关系对他来说是很痛苦的。他妻子的死给他的人生留下了痛苦的空虚感。让水母刺着是很痛的。手术很痛。他通过艰辛的努力获得了奖牌。要我承认错了，是很费力的。

translation: n. 画家；油漆匠n. (Painter)人名；(英)佩因特
examples: He is an amateur painter.The painter stretched the canvas on a frame.He was an unknown painter one year ago.The painter pitched the ladder against the wall.
他是一个业余画家。画家把油画布紧绷在画框上。一年前，他还是一个不为人知的画家。油漆匠将梯子斜靠在墙上。

translation: n. 绘画；油画；着色v. 绘画（paint的ing形式）；涂色于n. (Painting)人名；(英)佩因廷
examples: The painting took his fancy, so he bought it.Looking at a beautiful painting always gives one satisfaction.There are three paintings on the wall.That is an oil painting of a landscape in spring.He is a stranger to music and painting.Medieval painting is outside his province.
这幅画被他看中了,所以他就把它买了下来。观赏一幅美丽的图画使人心满意足。墙上有三幅画。那是一幅描绘春天景色的油画。他对音乐和绘画是一窍不通。中世纪的绘画不属于他的研究范围。

translation: n. 一对，一双，一副vt. 把…组成一对n. (Pair)人名；(英、法)佩尔
examples: These two cups will make a pair.The newly married couple are really a happy pair.This pair of shoes is durable.The young girl has a pair of almond eyes.I have a pair of leather gloves.My brother needs a new pair of glasses.The teacher paired us off for the purpose of the exercise.Pair the socks and put them in the drawer .I'll pair up you and her for the dance.You must pair your headset and phone before you can make a call.
这两个杯子可以配成一对。那对新婚夫妇真是快乐的一对。这双鞋很耐磨。这个年轻的姑娘长着一双杏眼。我有一副皮革手套。我弟弟需要一副新眼镜。为了做练习，老师把我们分成一对一对。把袜子配成双，然后放到抽屉里。这个舞会上,我把你和她配成对跳舞。在使用耳机通话前，耳机必须与手机配对。

translation: n. 宫殿；宅邸；豪华住宅
examples: There are many flocks of tourists in the palace.Have you been to the Imperial Palace?The carriage passed through the palace gate.Compared to ours their house is a palace.The Palace won't like all this gossip.
宫殿里有好几群游客。你去过故宫吗？马车进入了宫殿的大门。他们的房子和我们的相比简直太豪华了。国王不会喜欢这些流言蜚语的。

translation: n. 平底锅；盘状的器皿；淘盘子，金盘，秤盘vt. 淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；[非正式用语]严厉的批评vi. 淘金；在淘洗中收获金子
examples: I cracked two eggs into the frying pan.Take a pan or box and fill it with sand or cat litter.The water was run off from the pan so that the sand remained.They dip the pan into the bed of the stream, and then pan out the sand and dirt, hoping that some gold will be left.His new film was really panned by the critics.Nobody knew how the things would pan out.
我往平底锅里打了两个鸡蛋。拿一个盘子或盒子，里面装上沙子或者干草。把淘盘里的水放掉，让沙留着。他们用淘盘舀出小溪溪底泥沙，然后淘去泥沙，希望有金子留下来。他新拍摄的电影确实受到评论家严厉的批评。没人知道事情结果将会怎样。

translation: n. 熊猫；猫熊n. (Panda)人名；(印、塞)潘达
examples: I have never seen a panda.The panda is now a rare animal.Pandas are loved by people all over the world.
我从未见过熊猫。熊猫现在是稀有动物。熊猫被全世界的人们喜爱。

translation: n. 纸；论文；文件；报纸adj. 纸做的vt. 用纸糊；用纸包装vi. 贴糊墙纸；发交通违章传票n. (Paper)人名；(俄)帕佩尔
examples: That paper has yellowed with age.The letter was written on a single sheet of paper.He refused to subscribe his name to the paper.The paper advertises for two editors.We read about the storm in the paper today.She's working hard at her term paper.Do you have enough time to finish the paper?Please hand in your paper before June thirtieth.His paper was out in large quantities.The issuing company may sell the paper directly to the dealer.We stripped away the old patterned paper.The room was damp and the paper was peeling off.I need a paper box.These apartments have paper walls.It's just a paper promise.
那张纸因年代久远而泛黄了。这封信只用一张纸写成。他拒绝在这文件上签字。这家报纸招聘两名编辑。从今天的报纸上我们得知今天有风暴她正在努力撰写学期论文。你有足够的时间写完论文吗？请在六月三十日前交论文。他的票据大量地流在外面。发行公司可能直接将票据出售给交易商。我们刮去了旧的花壁纸。屋子很潮湿，壁纸都一片片剥落了。我需要一个纸盒子。这些公寓房间的墙壁单薄。这只是一纸空文的保证。

translation: n. 原谅；赦免；宽恕vt. 原谅；赦免；宽恕n. (Pardon)人名；(德、法、捷)帕尔东
examples: I do beg your pardon.She supplicated for pardon.They all sued out a pardon for an offender.He begged a pardon from the king.Pardon my strong language, please.I hope you will pardon me for my negligence.Please pardon my presumption in writing to you.We must pardon the young man his little faults.I will not pardon you, you rascal.
一定请您原谅。她恳求原谅。他们请求法院赦免一名罪犯。他恳求国王赦免自己的罪行。请原谅我说了激烈的话。我希望您原谅我的疏忽大意。请原谅我很冒昧地写信给你。我们必须宽恕这个年轻人的小过错。我不会宽恕你，你这个无赖。

translation: n. 父亲（或母亲）；父母亲；根源n. (Parent)人名；(法)帕朗；(英、西)帕伦特
examples: My parents have gone to Hangzhou for holiday.Being a parent can be hard work.Ignorance is the parent of many evils.Greed is the parent of many evils.We should parent children with both love and discipline.True albinos occur in about one in 10,000 births, after inheriting a rare and recessive albino gene from each parent.Prime Creator lets its creations be and learns about its own potential by watching what it has birthed, just as a wise parent learns from its children.
我父母已经去杭州度假了。当父母可是件辛苦的事。无知是许多罪恶的根源。贪婪是万恶之根源。我们应该用爱和管教来抚养孩子。在遗传了各别父母既稀少的又隐性的白子基因后，真实的白子以在一万胎之中大约一只来产生。最初的创造者通过观察造物的产生来让他的造物具有和学习他自己的潜力，正如一位聪明的父亲学习它的孩子。

translation: n. 公园；[交] 停车场vt. 停放；放置；寄存vi. 停放车辆n. (Park)人名；(英、芬、瑞典)帕克
examples: He leaves his car in the hotel car park.I often take my children to play in the park.Water, electricity, steam, natural gas and plant air will supplied by the park.How to get to the baseball park?My car is parked over there.You are not allowed to park here.Small cars are easier to park than big ones.Don't park bicycles on the pavement.Park your luggage here while you buy a ticket.Park yourself in that chair while I make you a cup of tea.
他把车停放在旅馆的停车场。我经常带我的孩子们去公园玩。水、电、蒸汽、天然气、工业气体等由园区统一供给。棒球场怎么走？我的汽车停放在那儿了。此处不准停车。小车比大车容易停放。人行道上不准停放自行车。你去买票，行李就先放在这儿吧。你坐在那张椅子上，我给你沏茶去。

translation: n. 停车adj. 停车的v. 停车（park的ing形式）n. (Parking)人名；(英)帕金
examples: No parking on the pavement.There is no parking around here.We encouraged the Smiths before leaving the parking lot.The policeman filled out a parking ticket.I'm sure he took my parking space just out of spite.
人行道/路面上不许停车。这周围不准停车。在离开停车场之前，我们鼓励了史密斯一家。警察填好一张违章停车罚款单。我认为他侵占我的停车位肯定是有意和我作对。

translation: n. 停车场
examples: There's only one inlet to the parking lot.Tell that joker to stop using my parking space.
这个停车场只有一个入口。叫那个家伙不要占用我的停车场。

translation: n. 鹦鹉；学舌者，应声虫；机械模仿别人的人vt. 机械地模仿n. (Parrot)人名；(英、俄、葡)帕罗特；(法)帕罗
examples: The boy had a parrot on his right shoulder.He talks like a parrot and just repeats what he heard.My little brother is also my parrot, always doing everything I do.This parrot is an amazing mimic.It is not a writer's job to play the parrot.Coming home from Europe, America or Japan, they can only parrot things foreign.
男孩把一只鹦鹉放在右肩上。他只是鹦鹉学舌，拾人牙慧罢了。我的小弟弟也是我的模仿者，我做什么他也做什么。这只鹦鹉很会学舌。作家绝不可鹦鹉学舌。他们从欧美日本回来，只知生吞活剥地谈外国。

translation: n. 部分；角色；零件；一些；片段vt. 分离；分配；分开vi. 断裂；分手adv. 部分地adj. 部分的n. (Part)人名；(英、瑞典)帕特；(泰)巴；(法)帕尔
examples: This piece of glass seems to be part of a lamp.This is one of the nicest parts of San Francisco.He liked the feeling of being part of the team.We're waiting for an auto part to come from Germany.I've been asked to play the part of the evil stepmother in the school play.The knee is the most frequently injured part of the body.The cable suddenly parted.The crowd had parted to let them through.It's sad that we have to part company with them.I hope we can part as friends.She tried to part the two fighting dogs.There was one issue where I parted company with the committee.Their feelings were part excitement, part fear.The development is part-financed by the Energy Department.
这片玻璃似乎是一盏灯的一部分。这是旧金山最好的地方之一。他喜欢成为这个队伍的一部分。我们正在等来自德国的汽车零件。学校要我在戏剧中饰演邪恶的后妈。膝盖是人体最容易受伤的部位。缆索突然断裂。人群分散开好让他们通过。很遗憾我们要与他们分别了。我希望我们和和气气地分手。她设法把两条打架的狗分开。我与委员会在有个问题上持不同的看法。他们即兴奋又害怕。部分开拓基金是由能源部提供的。

translation: adj. 兼职的；部分时间的adv. 兼职地；用部分时间地
examples: In American, seven out of ten mothers have paid jobs, either full time or part time. These include more than half of women with babies or young children.But he said the part-time soldiers, who will serve about three weeks at a time, will not be directly involved in detaining people trying to cross the border illegally.
在美国，有十分之七的妈妈有全职或兼职的带薪工作，其中超过一半妇女有婴儿或很小的小孩。但他说，兼职的士兵将会连续工作三周，但是不会直接牵涉到阻止那些尝试非法进入边境的人们。

translation: n. 政党，党派；聚会，派对；当事人 [复数 parties]vi. 参加社交聚会 [ 过去式 partied 过去分词 partied 现在分词 partying ]
examples: It's a pity that you can't come to the party.There was a liberal supply of drinks at the party.The Labour party went out in 1980.He was admitted to the Party last year.The Government set up a working party to look into the problem.Is this solution acceptable to all parties concerned?That night we partied until dawn.
你不能来参加这次聚会，真可惜。那次宴会上有大量饮料供应。工党于1980年下野。他去年入党了。政府成立了工作小组调查那个问题。这个解决办法有关各方是否都能接受?那晚我们痛饮到天亮

translation: n. 及格；经过；护照；途径；传球vi. 经过；传递；变化；终止vt. 通过；经过；传递n. (Pass)人名；(英、法、德、俄)帕斯
examples: The bill passed and became law.I passed the store on my way to the library.Where did you pass the vacation?Pass the salt, please.What happened after three months pass?It came to pass in those days that there went out a decree.A sergeant asked the stranger to show his pass.She got a pass in math.Please show me your monthly bus pass.
议案通过后成了法律。我在去图书馆的路上经过了那家商店。你在什么地方度过假期的？请递给我盐瓶。三个月过去后发生了什么？一桩违犯法令的事在那些日子里发生了。警官要求这个陌生人出示通行证。她数学及格了。请出示公共汽车月票。

translation: n. 旅客；乘客；过路人；碍手碍脚的人
examples: The mysterious woman passenger vanished.The passenger berthed beside me.The allowance per passenger is 25 kg.Passenger traffic has gone up by 20 per cent.
这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。这名乘客的铺位在我的旁边。每个旅客的行李重量限25公斤。客流量已增长百分之二十。

translation: n. 过去；往事adj. 过去的；结束的prep. 越过；晚于adv. 过；经过
examples: It is past my power.It was past midnight when we got home.He hurried past me without stopping.They walked past without stoppingWe drove past the house.His pain is past now.
这是我力所不及的。我们到家时已过半夜.他匆忙从我身边走过，连停都没停。他们一步不停地走了过去。我们开车经过那座房子。他的痛苦现在已经过去。

translation: n. 道路；小路；轨道
examples: A bullet describes a curved path in the air.We bumped up and down along the gravel path.They went out for a walk on the gravelled path.I very much hope that this is merely a temporary phenomenon before a path could be found for emerging Asia to move again towards and adhere to financial freedom.The moon's path is round the earth.Our path bristles with difficulties.Let me carry the lamp through the stormy path.
子弹在空中作曲线运动。我们沿砾石小路颠簸而行。他们在碎石小径上散步。我衷心希望这只属暂时的现象,不久亚洲新兴市场便会重回开放金融的轨道。月亮绕地球的轨道。我们的路程困难重重。走过暴风雨的路程吧。

translation: adj. 有耐心的，能容忍的n. 病人；患者n. (Patient)人名；(法)帕蒂安
examples: You'll have to be patient with my mother  she's going rather deaf.He is a patient man, but not even he could sit down under that kind of provocation.To have access to the good things of the world, one has to be patient and wait.After patient explanations, he carried all the members with him on that proposal.The patient began to gain ground as soon as she had good food.The patient is seriously ill and is being kept under continuous observation.
你对我母亲得有耐心，她的耳朵越来越背了。他是一个能忍耐的人，但就连他也没法忍受那种挑衅了。对于世间美好的东西,忍耐与等待是不可缺少的。他通过耐心解释，说服了所有成员接受了他的那项建议。这位病人饮食一好，她的病情就开始好转了。病人病情严重，现接受持续观察。

translation: n. 暂停；间歇vi. 暂停，停顿，中止；踌躇n. (Pause)人名；(德)保泽
examples: There will be a brief pause in the program.I made the classic mistake of clapping in a pause in the music!There was a pregnant pause before she answered my question.His words were followed by a pregnant pause.Weather condition is bad enough to give pause to even the most experienced climber.He paused before making the important decision.A speaker should pause when coming to the end of a sentence.You should pause and ponder now.At the top of the rise they pause for a rest.
这个计划可能需要暂停一下。我在乐曲演奏暂停的间歇鼓起掌来，真是大错特错！她耐人寻味地停顿了一下才回答我的问题。他说完话，接着是一段意味深长的停顿。天气十分恶劣，即使最有经验的登山者也犹豫不决。他在作出这个重要决定前犹豫不决。每讲完一句话，讲话者都应该停顿一下。你现在应该停下来仔细考虑一下。他们在小山的顶部停下来休息。

translation: vt. 支付，付；偿还，补偿；给予vi. 付款；偿还n. 工资，薪水；付款；报答adj. 收费的；需付费的
examples: I'd like to pay with my credit card.My firm pays well.Let me pay for dinner.You've got to be able to make your business pay well.It would probably pay you to hire an accountant.They will pay for their arrogance!He'll have to pay for what he has done.He doesn't like that job, but the pay is good.The workers in our pay work very hard.This is a pay telephone.There is a pay streak here.
我想用信用卡支付。我公司工酬优厚。晚饭让我来付。你得设法使你的生意赢利。聘一位会计师或许对你有好处。他们会为自大付出代价!他将为自己所做的一切付出代价。他不喜欢那工作,但薪水很高。我们雇用的员工工作很努力。这是缴费电话。这里有开采价值的矿层。

translation: n. 豌豆n. (Pea)人名；(意)佩亚
examples: This kind of pea has a long pod.Pea pods burst open when overripe.We have a bowl of very salty pea and ham soup.The sisters are as alike as two peas.
这种豌豆长着长豆荚。豌豆过熟就会爆裂。我们喝了一碗非常咸的豌豆火腿汤。两姐妹长得一模一样。

translation: n. [园艺] 梨树；梨子n. (Pear)人名；(英)皮尔
examples: This pear is rotten at the core.Would you like a pear?This salad is made of apple, pear, potato and celery.There are many pear trees covered in blossom.The partridge in a pear tree was Jesus Christ.
这个梨子的果心腐烂了。想吃梨吗？这份色拉是由苹果、梨、土豆和芹菜做成的。那里有许多开满花的梨树。在梨树上的鹌鹑就是耶稣基督。

translation: n. 钢笔；作家；围栏vt. 写；关入栏中n. (Pen)人名；(法)庞；(俄、塞、英、意)佩恩；(柬)宾
examples: The pen slips out of my fingers.Put down my pen and stop fiddling!He dipped his pen in the ink.She fumbled about in her handbag for a pen.The duke wrote a letter with a quill pen.He lives by his pen.The safest is the infantile bed that holds good pen.Look at how beautiful the pen is floating on the lake!She penned a few words of thanks.
钢笔从我指缝中滑下去了。把我的钢笔放下，别用手玩弄！他拿钢笔蘸墨水。她在手提袋中搜寻钢笔。公爵用一根羽毛笔写信。他以写作为生。最安全的是装好围栏的婴儿床。你看那只雌天鹅浮在湖面上，多美啊！她写了几句致谢的话。

translation: n. 铅笔；笔状物vt. 用铅笔写；用眉笔涂vi. 成铅笔状

他擦去铅笔的痕迹。我的铅笔钝了，你能借我把刀子削一削吗？我用电话旁的一根铅笔记下了他的电话号码。他从口袋中掏出一支笔形电筒。他在一张纸上用铅笔写下了自己的名字。

translation: n. 铅笔盒；文具盒

我已经把铅笔盒放在她的课桌里了。他铅笔盒里有块橡皮。

translation: 笔友
examples: This is me some of the situations Penfriend!My penfriend is very kind to others.
这就是我笔友的一些情况！我的笔友对别人很友好。

translation: n. 胡椒；辣椒；胡椒粉vt. 加胡椒粉于；使布满n. (Pepper)人名；(英、德、意)佩珀

他的表演深深地吸引住观众。建议容易实行难。他在学校的优良表现为他母亲带来极大的荣誉。他勤勉地履行职责。汽车的可靠性比其机械性能更重要。张艺谋总是有本事让演员带来意想不到的、充满新意的表演技巧。

translation: adv. 或许；（表示不确定）也许；（用于粗略的估计）或许；（表示勉强同意或其实不赞成）也许；可能n. 假定；猜想；未定之事
examples: Perhaps this book will prove to be of some use to you in your studies.As she's been ill perhaps she'll need some help.Perhaps you left your e-dictionary in the dorm.
也许这本书会对你的研究有用处。她由于生病可能需要些帮助。可能你将电子词典忘在宿舍里了。

translation: n. 人；身体；容貌，外表；人称n. (Person)人名；(法、俄、德)佩尔松；(瑞典)佩尔松；(英)珀森
examples: You are just the person I want to see.He is a very nice person to work with.Every person is accountable for his own work.The firm has an important asset in the person of the director of research.The winner will be there in person to collect the prize.The folds of a great cloak encompassed her person.
你正是我要见的人。他是一个很好共事的人。每个人都要对自己的工作负责。公司有一巨大财富，就是研究部主任这个人。奖金需获奖者本人领取。大斗篷的褶层包裹着她的身体。

translation: adj. 个人的；身体的；亲自的n. 人事消息栏；人称代名词

我有点私事和你商量。有一件私事我想听听你的建议,但不是我的事。是我自己提出的,完全出于我个人的关切。仅花了两个小时,我就把个人陈述写好了。个人清洁对于健康和仪表同样重要。

translation: n. 人事部门；全体人员adj. 人员的；有关人事的

全体工作人员对改变这些规定很不高兴。这家公司的主要问题是缺少有技术的人员。军职人员常被禁止与平民百姓友好往来。人事部门正在组织新雇员的培训。要了解更多工作详情,请和人事部经理联系。

translation: n. 宠物；生气；受宠爱的人vt. 宠爱vi. 生气；爱抚adj. 宠爱的n. (Pet)人名；(俄)佩特；(柬)贝
examples: My daughter keeps a rabbit as pet.She is the teacher's pet.The little girl cuddled her pet cat.Talk quietly to your kitten and gently pet her.
我的女儿养了一只兔子当做宠物。她是老师的宠儿。这个小女孩搂抱着她的宠物猫。温柔的对它说话，轻轻的抚摩它。

translation: n. 电话；耳机，听筒vt. 打电话vi. 打电话n. (Phone)人名；(老、缅)蓬

你的电话号码是多少？盛怒之下，我差点把电话机砸碎。她拿起话筒,但并没有说话。我用骨头调整了石质耳机的音调。在你办公室的电话机旁安装一个头戴式耳机。

translation: n. 照片
examples: The photo has faded beyond recognition.The woman on the photo is my paternal grandmother.When I waited for the No.13 line, I photoed them.
相片已经模糊，不能辨认。照片上的这个妇人是我祖母。当我挺无聊地等待13号线时,我给他们拍了照。

translation: n. 物理学；物理现象

他的物理学得很好。我喜欢化学甚于物理。她在大学期间主修数学和物理。他在物理学方面已经取得了卓越的成就。爱因斯坦理论开创了物理学的新纪元。原子弹是20世纪物理学的产物。

translation: n. 钢琴n. (Piano)人名；(法、意、葡)皮亚诺
examples: He is a wizard at playing the piano.She is learning to play the piano.
他是个钢琴奇才。她在学弹钢琴。

translation: vi. 挑选；采摘；挖vt. 拾取；精选；采摘；掘n. 选择；鹤嘴锄；挖；掩护n. (Pick)人名；(英、法、德、捷、匈、瑞典)皮克
examples: That sentimental girl likes to pick up the fallen petals on the ground in autumn.He picked the watch up from the carpet.We had to find a flat in a hurry--there was no time to pick and choose.You should not pick any of the flowers in the park.He seemed determined to pick a quarrel with us.He picked up French while he was staying in Paris.He bent to the ground to pick up the pen.Please pick up dog feces from camps and trails.His pick of the wallet on his way home had caused him great trouble.Here are ten books in English, take your pick.The pick of apples is put off due to the bad weather.The pick of this poem lies in the last sentence.He breaks up strong ground with a pick.I don't want us all to run at the nearest politician with a pick axe!

那个多愁善感的女孩喜欢在秋天里拾起地上的落英。他从地毯上把表捡起来。我们只好匆忙找套房子--没有时间挑选了.你不应该采摘这个公园里的任何一朵花。他似乎存心要找我们吵架。他在巴黎时学会了法语。他弯腰从地上拾起钢笔。请从帐蓬和小道上拾起狗的排泄物。他在回家的路上捡了一个钱包,这一捡给他惹了大麻烦。这里有十本英文书,你挑吧。因为天气不好,采摘苹果的活动被推迟了。这首诗的精华是最后一句。他用镐刨开坚硬的地面。我不希望大家突然用镐斧进攻最近的政治家。

translation: n. 野餐vi. 去野餐
examples: Let's go for a picnic by the riverside.We had a lot of fun at the picnic on the beach.It's no picnic having to look after 6 small children all day.Their family often picnics in the woods.You can picnic along the river bank.
我们到河边野餐去吧。我们在海滩上野餐，趣味无穷。整天照看6个小孩子可不是轻松愉快的事。他们一家常在树林里野餐。你们可以靠河沿野餐。

translation: n. 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身vt. 画；想像；描写
examples: May I take a picture of you?The Pianist is the fourth movie nominated for Best Picture.The book gives a good picture of everyday life in ancient rome.This book gives a good picture of life in China 100 hundred years ago.Draw a picture of the house so we know what it looks like.I can't picture the village without the old church.You should picture to yourself the brilliant future ahead of us .The artist used red and orange to picture the sun set.They were pictured against a background of flowers.Could you take a picture for me?She's taking a picture of the children.
我可以给你照相吗？《钢琴家》是第4部获得最佳影片提名的电影。那部书对古罗马人的日常生活描写得很生动。这本书形象地描写了一百年前的中国生活。画出房子的图来让我们看看是什麽样子的。我无法设想村子里没有那座旧教堂像什麽样子你该想象一下我们光明灿烂的前途。那位画家用红色和橙色画落日。他们在画中背景有很多花。你能帮我拍照吗？她正给孩子们拍照。

translation: n. 馅饼；饼图；爱说话的人vt. 使杂乱
examples: That pie tastes good.Help yourself to this apple pie.Pie and doughnut charts do not have axes.She can talk for the whole day, just like a pie.
那个馅饼味道不错。请吃点苹果馅饼。饼图和圆环图没有轴。她整天说话,像只喜鹊。

translation: n. 块；件；篇；硬币vt. 修补；接合；凑合
examples: The book is a fine piece of scholarship.This is an elegant piece of writing.Would you please give me a piece of paper?I think I can do with one more piece.It's a good piece of word, except for a few slight faults.
这部书是一件优秀的学术成果。这篇东西写得很优美。能给我一张纸吗？我想我还能再吃一块。除了一引起小缺点外,不失为一件好作品。

translation: n. 猪；猪肉vi. 生小猪；像猪一样过活n. 警察（俚语，带有攻击性）

我已尽力让我的观点清晰明了。好了，你已经把话说清楚了。我不明白她最后那句话的意思。他完全没抓住我演讲的重点。你的弱点是你总是需要得到别人的同意才有信心。罗斯的特点是对日期的记忆力很强。直线AB与直线CD相交于E点。在那个地点造桥是不可行的。我将在进港大厅的迎接点等你。小数点前总有一个数字。训练员站在象前面,手拿着锐利金属尖的长棒。那条船绕过了岬角。不一会儿，小帆船绕过海角，不见了踪影。为芝麻绿豆般的小事争论实在毫无意义。在这段时间里,许多代表团都表现出了最大限度的灵活性,以达成他们所期望的目标。她要赢得这一分才能将比分扳平。把水加热至沸点。铅的熔点比铁的低。浴室里有供电动剃须刀用的电源插座。字体大小由磅值指定。他指着图表来说明他的论点。时钟的针指向五点钟。旋转屋顶可以使望远镜朝向任何一个方向。别用枪指着我。只要把照相机对准，然后按动快门就可以了。

examples: The police have caught the murderer.His strange behavior made the police suspicious.It's the duty of the police to preserve the public order.The police are always hounding me.The police scoured the area looking for the lost child.United Nation forces are sent to police the troubled area.Hundreds of military officers were drafted in to police the demonstration.The army policed the conquered city.A new body has been set up to police the nuclear power industry.
警察已经抓获杀人凶手。他不寻常的举止引起了警察的怀疑。维护公共秩序是警察的职责。警方一直在追捕我。警方搜遍这个地区寻找这个走失的孩子。联合国部队被派去维持该动乱地区的秩序。抽调了数百名军官去维护示威游行的秩序。军队管制这个被占领的城市。已设立了新机构来监督核电工业。

translation: n. 警察，警员；[分化] 淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒）
examples: The policeman watched his quarry go into a bar.The wounded policeman is now out of danger.
警察看著他在追捕的人走进一家酒吧。受伤的警察已经脱离危险。

translation: vt. 污染；玷污；败坏
examples: Our store never sells books which pollute the mind.We should not pollute our rivers with waste.
我们书店从不出售污染心灵的书籍。我们不应让废弃物污染我们的河川。

translation: n. 联营；撞球；水塘；共同资金vi. 联营，合伙经营vt. 合伙经营n. (Pool)人名；(英、西)普尔；(芬、德)波尔
examples: A fringe of trees stood round the pool.They stripped off and jumped into the pool.There is a swimming pool in the park.To save gas, many people joined the car pool.Let' s pool our money to buy a car.They had planned to pool their earnings to start a home.Now the drops run and pool together.If we pool our ideas, we may find a solution.
池塘四周耸立着一圈树木。他们脱掉衣服，跳进了池子。公园里有一个游泳池。为节省汽油,许多人参加车辆共乘。让我们合资来买一辆汽车。他们计划着把他们两个人赚得的钱凑起来建立一个家庭。此刻水珠流动而聚集在一起。我们集思广益就能找到解决办法。

translation: adj. 贫穷的；可怜的；贫乏的；卑鄙的n. (Poor)人名；(英、伊朗)普尔
examples: The poor horse looked all skin and bone.He was too poor to buy a new coat.Sparkling white wine is the poor man's champagne.Some people may regard radio as the poor relation of broadcasting.My eyes were tired from reading in a poor light.Conditions in poor quarters were horrible.She works hard for the welfare of the poor.
这匹马骨瘦如柴,看起来很可怜。他穷得无法买新衣。白葡萄汽酒算是廉价的香槟。有些人可能认为无线电广播在广播事业中稍逊一筹。因在不良的光线下阅读,我的眼睛很疲劳。城里穷人居住区条件十分糟糕。她为了穷人的福利而辛勤工作。

translation: n. 流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击vi. 突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声vt. 取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动adj. 流行的；通俗的；热门的adv. 突然；砰地abbr. 邮局协议（post office protocol）n. (Pop)人名；(罗、捷、塞)波普
examples: The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.I must pop round to baker's for a loaf of bread.The rabbits popped out as soon as we opened the hutch.He seem to pop up in the most unlikely place.The balloon will pop if you put a pin in it.If your eyes pop, they open very wide in surprise or excitement.He popped off a couple of shots to scare away the bear.He likes pop; he doesn't care for classic music.The balloon burst with a loud pop."Pop, what are you talking about?" The son screams.We've got many students study pop psychology in our school.I have no interest in pop music.

他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。我得到面包店去买一个面包来。我们一打开兔箱，兔子就突然跑出来了。在他似乎绝不可能到的地方,他往往就在那里出现。如果扎进一颗大头钉, 气球就会突然爆开。如果你的眼睛睁大,它们是因为惊奇或者兴奋而张开。为了把熊吓走他开了几枪。他喜欢流行歌曲，不喜欢古典音乐。气球砰地一声爆炸了。“爸爸,你在说什么呀?”儿子惊叫起来。我们学校有很多学生学习通俗心理学。我对流行音乐不感兴趣。

translation: adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的
examples: Her charm of manner made her very popular.Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.He is very interested in what are called popular songs.Fashion is a very popular magazine in America.He thinks to still need finally to combine popular force to solve this problem.
她风度优雅，备受欢迎。在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。他对所谓的流行歌曲很感兴趣。《时尚》是美国很流行的杂志。他认为最终还是需要结合大众的力量来解决这个问题。

translation: n. 人口；[生物] 种群，[生物] 群体；全体居民
examples: What is the population of this country?The density of population in this city is very high.There has been a steady decrease in population in this city.We have a growing population and therefore we need more food.The invaders prevailed over the native population.The population seemd to be well fed and clothed.The sparse vegetation will only feed a small population of animals.All of the plant population in this habitat decreased.
这个国家的人口是多少？这个城市的人口密度非常高。这个城市的人口在持续下降。我们的人口在增长，因此我们需要更多的食物。入侵者打败了土著居民。全体居民好像是丰衣足食。稀疏的植物只能喂少量的动物族群。此栖地的所有植物族群减少了。

translation: n. 猪肉vt. 与女子性交n. (Pork)人名；(俄)波尔克
examples: The little girl only eats lean pork.In some religions pork is considered impure.
这个小女孩只吃瘦肉。某些宗教认为猪肉是亵渎的。

translation: n. 粥，糊；麦片粥vt. 服刑
examples: She spooned out bowls of porridge.The dog quickly lapped up all the porridge.I had a bowl of porridge for breakfast.We can ask Sarah to make porridge for you,if you like.
她用匙舀出了几碗粥。狗不一会儿就把所有的粥都舐光了。我早餐吃了一碗麦片粥。要是你喜欢喝粥，我们可以叫萨拉给你做麦片粥。

translation: adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[医][化学] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的n. 正数；[摄] 正片
examples: He has a positive attitude towards life.We regret out inability to let you know anything positive concerning the above firm.We still don't have a positive answer as to how he died.These developments will have a positive effect on the stability of our financial market.Parameter can be positive or negative.The blood tests were positive.The relationship with this supplier is positive.There are positive and negative markers.The given parameter value must be positive.This property always returns a positive number.'Short' is the positive and 'shorter' the comparative.
他对生活持有积极的态度。很抱歉，我方无法让您了解上述公司任何肯定的资料。他究竟是如何死的，我们还未得出明确的答案。这些发展对稳定我们的金融市场会产生正面的作用。参数可以是正数也可以是负数。验血结果呈阳性。我与供应商的关系是正面的。有正面和负面的标记。给出的参数值必须是正数。该属性总是返回正数。Short是原级形容词，shorter是比较级形容词。

translation: adj. 可能的；合理的；合适的n. 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物
examples: I'll do everything possible to help you.It isn't remotely possible that you will be chosen to go.You'd better rest as much as possible.As I'm going on a diet, I have to eat as little as possible.There are several possible explanations.It is a possible choice for their factory to raise the output quickly.
我会尽一切可能帮助你。挑选你去的可能性并非很小。你要尽可能多休息。我正在节食,得尽量少吃。有几种合理的解释。他们的工厂迅速提高产量是合理的。

translation: adv. 可能地；也许；大概
examples: It is a parsimonious representation of a possibly complex thing.Possibly because it's an electric razor.He is possibly the most selfish man in the town.
这就是以简约来代表可能地复杂的事情。也许是因为那是电动剃刀吧？他也许是镇上最自私的人。

translation: n. 岗位；邮件；标杆vt. 张贴；公布；邮递；布置vi. 快速行进n. (Post)人名；(英、西、捷、瑞典、荷)波斯特
examples: He has no qualifications for the post.Your duties include checking and dispatching the posts.He struggled to run towards the winning post.I would be quite grateful if you would post this letter.Will you please keep us posted for this accident?Advertisements have been posted up everywhere announcing the new show.After several years in London, he was posted to the embassy in Moscow.He was here on business, so he had to post instead of travelling around leisurely.She went post to the bank and cashed the cheque.
他没有资格担任该职位。你的职责是检查和发送邮件。他拼命地向获胜标冲去。要是你肯寄这封信,我将十分感激。你能告诉我们这起事件的最新消息吗？到处贴满了广告宣传这一新节目。他在伦敦任职几年后被派往驻莫斯科大使馆工作。他来这儿是出差,所以他不得不匆匆赶路,哪有时间四处闲逛。她急忙赶到银行,把支票兑换成现金。

translation: n. 明信片
examples: He sent me a postcard from the United Nations.Excuse me, how much is a postcard to France?
他从联合国给我寄来一张明信片。打扰一下，寄往法国的明信片多少钱一张？

translation: n. 邮递员；邮差
examples: The postman has brought a parcel for you.Our dog went at the postman again this morning.
邮递员给你送来了一个包裹。今天我们的狗又扑咬邮递员了。

translation: n. [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
examples: The potato is a vegetable, not a fruit.This salad is made of apple, pear, potato and celery.I like to cook dishes with potatoes.Would you like more mashed potato?Stick the fork into the potato.For the first time he enjoyed a roast potato.
马铃薯是一种蔬菜，不是一种水果。这份色拉是由苹果、梨、土豆和芹菜做成的。我喜欢用马铃薯炒菜。在来点马铃薯泥好吗？用叉子插土豆。他第一次享受到烤土豆的味道。

translation: n. 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所vt. 捣烂；敲打；监禁，拘留vi. 连续重击，猛击n. (Pound)人名；(英)庞德
examples: I lost several pounds last month.The shop is selling choice apple, so I buy 3 pound.There is a 1 pound admission charge.I paid him b pound , and he gave me 20 pence change.Have you redeemed your car from the pound?The farmers pound rice in a mortar.He had to pound the nails into the board with a stone.He pounded the table angrily.Do not pound up the stairs!Her head began to pound.
我上个月瘦了好几磅。那商店在卖上选苹果,所以我买了三磅。入场费为1英镑。我付了一英镑你有没有取回被扣的汽车?农民们在臼中舂米。他只好用石块将钉子敲进木板。他生气地猛拍桌子。上楼梯不要跺脚！她的头开始怦怦地抽痛。

translation: n. 倾泻；流出；骤雨vt. 灌，注；倒；倾泻；倾吐vi. 倾泻；涌流；斟茶n. (Pour)人名；(伊朗)普尔；(捷)保尔
examples: Blood was pouring from the wound.Although I poured it carefully, I spilt some of the oil.She watched the rain pouring down the windows.The fans poured out of the stadium cheering wildly.The shops and offices pour millions of workers into the street at this time of day.Into the new work she was going to pour all her thoughts and feelings, her vital life episodes, her bitter sweet experiences.
血从伤口中流出。虽然我倒油时很小心，但还是洒了一些。她注视著顺著窗户往下流的大雨。体育爱好者们欣喜若狂地从体育场中蜂涌而出。一天的这段时间有数以百万计的职工从工厂和办公场所涌向街头。她要把自己一生几个重要时期的经历和感受都熔入笔端倾泻在新作中。

translation: n. 实践；练习；惯例vi. 练习；实习；实行vt. 练习；实习；实行
examples: Daily practice is the trick in learning a foreign language.We must put our plans into practice.You should make a practice of being on time for work.I have a culture and art practice in my company.
每天练习是学会一门外语的诀窍。我们必须将计划付诸实行。你应该养成准时上班的习惯。我公司开办一项文化和艺术业务。

translation: vi. 练习，实践；实施，实行；从事vt. 练习，实践；实施，实行
examples: I need to practise my Italian before my business trip.I strive to practise these two virtues in my life.For the present, we have to practise the supply system of distribution.The majority of judgers are barrister, but they cannot practise as barrister.Lots of practise is necessary for well-learning english .Knowledge is a treasure, but practise is the key to it.
我出差之前需要先练习一下意大利语。我在生活中努力实践这两种美德。现在我们也只能实行供给制。多数法官是高级律师，但他们不能作为高级律师开业。要学好英语，大量的练习是必要的。知识是一个宝库，而实践却是打开这个宝库的钥匙。

translation: vt. 更喜欢；宁愿；提出；提升vi. 喜欢；愿意
examples: I would prefer to stay home rather than go out on such a rainy day.All this gracious living is not for me；I prefer the simple life.Which one do you prefer, an apple or an orange?Police preferred charges against him for theft.
在这种雨天，我宁可待在家也不出门。这种优裕的生活对我不合适；我还是更喜欢简朴的生活。你想要哪个，苹果还是橘子？警方指控他有偷窃行为。

translation: vt. 提出；介绍；呈现；赠送vi. 举枪瞄准adj. 现在的；出席的n. 现在；礼物；瞄准
examples: He bought me a valuable diamond ring as a birthday present.I wish to make you a present in token of my gratitude.Focusing on the future instead of the present can cripple any activity.There's no certain cure for this illness at present.He insists on being present.A number of local personalities were present at the meeting.According to our present ideas of physics, nothing can travel faster than light.I am content to stay in my present job.My present finances preclude the possibility of buying a car.He suspected that a leak was present somewhere along the pipe.He presented quite a new view of the affair.We should like to present some suggestions which would help settle the question.They presented a sum of money to the college in memory of their son.The whole village presented a face placid.The ships in the bay present a beautiful sight.

他给我买了一只贵重的钻戒作生日礼物。我想送你一件礼物，以表示对你的感谢之情。不注意现在只考虑将来就可能做不成任何事。现在这种病尚无确实可靠的疗法。他一定要出席。一些当地名人出席了会议。根据我们现在物理学的概念,没有什么东西能超过光速。我对现在的工作心满意足。按我目前的财务状况我是不可能买车的。他猜疑管道里什么地方漏了。他对那件事提出了相当新的看法。我们愿提出一些建议，可能有助于解决这个问题。他们向学院赠送了一笔款项以纪念他们的儿子。整个村庄呈现出一片宁静。海湾内的船舶呈现一派美丽的景致。

translation: vt. 压；按；逼迫；紧抱vi. 压；逼；重压n. 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机n. (Press)人名；(英、德、俄、西、瑞典)普雷斯
examples: Please press the controller to turn the machine on.Press this button in case of fire.The book is crumpled and needs press.Press firmly on the wound to stop the bleeding.He denied that he had leaked the news to the press.The press has given the show a tremendous build-up.This press publishes educational books.The press is ready to turn out a huge new edition.We read news in the daily press.This kind of newspaper is alternative press.The government's new policy received a good press.The book is crumpled and needs press.Every room in the hotel has an electric trouser press.The printing press was set up on the ground floor.We had a lot of bother in repairing the press machine.
请按控制器来开机。遇火灾时按下此钮。书皱了需要压一压。用力压住伤口止血。他否认曾将这则消息泄漏给新闻界。新闻界为这一演出大造声势。这家出版社出版教育书籍。该出版社准备出一本大部头新版本。我们从每天的报刊上看新闻。这种报纸是非正统性报刊。政府的新政策受到新闻舆论的好评。书皱了需要压一压。饭店每个客房都备有熨裤子的电熨烫机。印刷机安装在一楼。修理这台印刷机费了很大劲。

translation: adj. 漂亮的；可爱的；优美的adv. 相当地；颇n. 有吸引力的事物（尤指饰品）；漂亮的人n. Pretty，普雷蒂（人名）
examples: I am pretty sure that he'll say yes.After six months, I could speak Chinese pretty well.Rachel is a very pretty woman, just like her mother.What a pretty little garden!I want a window seat so that I can enjoy the pretty sights during the journey.My new curtains have a pretty blue and red pattern.The pretty girl got so much flattery that it quite turned her head.All the pretty women wore their smartest dresses.He is going after that pretty girl.
他会同意的,我对此相当有把握。6个月之后,我就能讲相当好的汉语了。瑞秋是一位很漂亮的女性,就像她的母亲一样。多么漂亮的小花园！我想要个靠窗的座位,好欣赏沿途的美景。我的新窗帘有个很好看的红蓝相间的图案。这位好看的姑娘得到这么多的奉承，这使得她冲昏头脑。所有漂亮的女士都穿著最漂亮的连衫裙。他在追求那个漂亮的女孩子。

translation: vt. 预防，防止；阻止vi. 妨碍，阻止
examples: Scientists are trying to find ways to prevent disease.It is the job of the police to prevent crime.Nothing can prevent us from carrying out the plan.Ways must be found to prevent the poisonous gases from polluting the air.
科学家们正试图找到预防疾病的方法。防止犯罪是警察的职责。什么也无法阻挡我们去实施这个计划。一定要找到办法防止有毒气体污染空气。

translation: adj. 以前的；早先的；过早的adv. 在先；在…以前
examples: His previous attempts had been unsuccessful.It happened previous to his arrival there.You must collect enough materials previous to your writing.
他以前的尝试没有成功。事件发生于他到那儿以前。你在写作之前必须收集好足够的材料。

translation: n. 价格；价值；代价vt. 给……定价；问……的价格n. (Price)人名；(英)普赖斯；(法)普里斯；(葡、瑞典)普里塞
examples: I wonder why the company keeps its price so low.No price is too high for winning their support.It will be cheap at the price if this tour can keep the whole family happy.I'll ask an expert to price the old car.The dresses in the shop are priced high.I don't know enough about porcelain to be able to price these plates.The assistant priced the garments before putting them on display.I want to price the beds in a few shops before I buy any.
我奇怪那个公司为什么把他们的价格压得那么低。为了获得他们的支持，任何代价均在所不惜。只要这次旅游能让全家人开心,再贵也值得了。我将请一位专家来给这辆旧车定价。这家商店的衣服定价很高。我不太懂得瓷器，估计不出这些盘子的价钱。营业员先给服装标好价格再摆出来卖。我想在买床之前先打听几家商店的价格。

translation: n. 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记vt. 印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样vi. 印刷；出版；用印刷体写
examples: How many copies shall we print from the negative?His second book is already in print.He founded his own press to print them.This printer can print 40 pages in a minute.During that time, the radiation diffused across short distance scales, smearing the fine print in the microwave background sky.The print is too small for me to read without glasses.The printmaking would lose direction if print artists have no skill interests in creation.This boundary is like the outer circumference of the Escher print or the surface of the solid cylinder I considered earlier.Her first novel is out of print now but you may find a second-hand copy.The thief had left his prints on the handle.He assures to us that we will get the blue print in time.The sofa was adorned with a gay print slipcover.He was standing in his print shirt and his waistcoat in front of his shop, which looked into the street.He saw Alpatitch, and went up to him.Headlines are written in large print.I closed up the space between the lines of print.

用这张底片我们要印多少张相片?他的第二本书已出版。他自己成立印刷厂出版这些书。这台打印机一分钟能打印40页。在这期间，辐射在短距离尺度上四处漫射，模糊了铭刻在微波背景天空上的细微印记。印刷字体太小，我不带眼镜就看不清。版画家脱离技术趣味进行创作时，版画创作就没有了方向感。这个边界就类似艾雪版画的外缘或者前面提过的圆柱体的表面。她的第一部小说现已绝版，不过你可以找本旧的。小偷在把手上留下了指纹。他向我们保证我们将及时得到蓝图。沙发上罩了一个鲜艳的印花套子。身穿背心和印花衬衫的费拉蓬托夫，站在面临大街的面粉店的傍边，他看见了阿尔帕特奇，便向他走过去。标题是用大号字体印刷的。我使印刷的行距靠紧些。

translation: n. [计] 打印机；印刷工；印花工
examples: You can hear the printer in the next office.Do you have enough money to buy a new printer?The printer can set this additional page in here.Edward was apprenticed to a printer.
你能听到隔壁办公室打印机的声音。你有足够的钱买一台新的打印机吗？这位印刷工把这额外的一页加在这里。爱德华被一位印刷工收为学徒。

translation: n. 奖品；奖赏；战利品vt. 珍视；捕获；估价adj. 获奖的
examples: The boys competed with each other for the prize.First prize in the raffle is a holiday for two in Paris.The champion team will win the cup and prize.They all concurred in giving him the prize.He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.I still prize all those early pamphlets .She will use the prize money to help pay for my education.She is the most likely girl to win the prize.The cowboy led in his prize winning Bull.She always makes a mess of things; she's a prize idiot.
那些男孩子为赢得奖品而互相竞争。抽奖销售的头奖是两个人到巴黎度假旅游。比赛的冠军将获得奖杯和奖金。他们一致同意给他奖赏。他因学习成绩优秀而受到奖赏。我仍珍视所有的那些早期小册子。她要用这笔奖金支付部分学费。她是最有希望得奖的女孩。牛仔把他得奖的公牛引导入内。她总是把事情弄糟; 她是个不折不扣的大笨蛋。

translation: adv. 大概；或许；很可能
examples: I'll be probably free then.That hotel probably costs no less than 20 dollars a night.He can probably tell us all the details we want.This plan would probably have some efficacy.He will probably refuse the offer.
那时我大概就有空了。那间旅馆的住宿费大约要20元一晚呢。他也许能告诉我们所需的全部详情。这计划也许会有些效力。他很可能会拒绝这一提议。

translation: n. 难题；引起麻烦的人adj. 成问题的；难处理的
examples: That's your problem.We had no time to deliberate on the problem.The problem is when to get the money we need.Heavy traffic poses a problem in many old towns.The students are working on a mathematical problem.Today's problem child may be tomorrow's criminal.
那是你的问题。我们没有时间仔细思考这个问题.问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。交通拥挤是许多旧城镇的难题。学生们正在解一道数学习题。今天的问题孩子可能就是明天的罪犯。

translation: vt. 生产；引起；创作；生育，繁殖n. 农产品，产品vi. 生产，创作
examples: This tree produces rubber.It is certain that we shall produce this kind of engine.The plain weave is comparatively inexpensive to produce.His announcement produced gasps of amazement.If you deny my statement, I can produce witness to prove its truth.He hopes to find the money to produce a film about Japan.Female sheep produce one or two lambs at a time.This shop sells native produce.Our chefs use only the freshest produce available.
这些树生产橡胶。毫无疑问,我们将生产这种发动机。相对来说,平纹组织的生产成本较低。他宣布的消息引起了一片惊叹声。如果你要否认我的陈述,我可以提出证据来证明其真实性。他希望筹集到资金以便拍一部关于日本的影片。母羊一次生一到两只羊羔。这家商店出售土特产品。我们的厨师只用现有最新鲜的农产品。

translation: n. 进步，发展；前进vi. 前进，进步；进行n. (Progress)人名；(赞)普罗格雷斯
examples: The student is showing rapid progress in his studies.Physics has made enormous progress in this century.They made slow progress towards the mountaintop.He continues to progress in his studies.In this way, our sciences will progress faster.Our company cannot progress until we employ more people.They progressed along dark stone corridors.We are meeting again tomorrow to try and progress the matter.
这个学生学习上进步很快。本世纪物理学的发展突飞猛进。他们向山顶缓慢地前进。他的学业继续取得进步。朝这个方向走，我们的科学事业的发展就可以快一些。我们公司只有雇用更多的人才能发展。他们沿着黑暗的石廊缓慢前进。我们打算明天再见面，试着推动这件事情的发展。

translation: vt. 保护，防卫；警戒
examples: He raised his arm to protect his child from hurt.These gallant soldiers will protect our country.These rare tigers are protected by special laws.Many of the homes weren't protected against flood damage.
他伸出手去，保护他的孩子免受伤害。这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的。这些珍贵的老虎受到专门法律的保护。许多家庭没有投水灾的保。

translation: adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的n. (Proud)人名；(英)普劳德
examples: If your father had still been alive, he would have felt very proud of you.It was a proud day for us when we won the trophy.They are poor but proud.He's too proud to speak to poor people like us.The sunflowers stretched tall and proud to the sun.
你父亲如果还健在的话,他会为你骄傲的。我们夺得奖杯那一天是值得我们骄傲的日子。他们虽穷但很自重。他太骄傲了,从不与我们这样的穷人说话。向日葵在阳光中亭亭玉立。

translation: vt. 提供；规定；准备；装备vi. 规定；抚养；作准备
examples: Sheep provide us with wool.The hotel provides a reservation of tickets for its residents.We have to provide for possible accidents.The law provides that these ancient buildings must be preserved.He was very poor because he'd to provide for five children.
羊供给我们羊毛。这家旅馆为旅客提供订票服务。我们要为可能发生的意外作些准备。法律规定，这些古老的建筑应该保存。他很穷,因为他要抚养五个孩子。

translation: n. 省；领域；职权
examples: British Columbia is a province of Canada.Hangzhou is the capital city of Zhejiang Province.
不列颠哥伦比亚是加拿大的一个省。杭州是浙江的省会城市。

translation: adj. 公众的；政府的；公用的；公立的n. 公众；社会；公共场所n. (Public)人名；(英)帕布利克
examples: Changing public perception may take some time.The pension fund owns shares in several major public companies.The government decided to promote public welfare.The town has its own public library and public gardens.She decided to make her views public.The area has been fenced from the public.The leader rarely shows herself in public.The town gardens are open to the public from sunrise to the sunset daily.This kind of programme always satisfied the public.
改变公众的看法需要一些时间。该养老基金在几家主要出售股份给公众的公司中均有股份。政府决定发展公共福利。那城市有自己的公用图书馆和公园。她决定把自己的观点公开。该地区为防止民众进出而围起来。这位领导她很少在公众场合露面。市立公园每天从早到晚对公众开放。这类节目总能令大众满意。

translation: vt. 拉；拔；拖vi. 拉，拖；拔n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖n. (Pull)人名；(法)皮尔；(德、瑞典)普尔
examples: The tractor pulls well.Don't pull my hair!Do not pull the chairs about, boys!They call it zugunruhe , the pull of the soul to a far-off place.Frog may be called even louder than cattle, but they can not pull plows in the fields, it will not pull in the wineshop grinding, they are also unable to do anything leather shoes.He will give me a shot and pull out my tooth.The football match pulled in great crowds.A pull on the rope will make the bell ring.I felt a pull at my sleeve and turned round.The tides depend on the pull of the moon.Some advertisements have no pull at all.Let's have a pull after dinner.He has a lot of pull with the managing director.
这台拖拉机拉力大。别扯我的头发！不要把椅子拖来拖去，孩子们！人们称之曰迁移兴奋，灵魂被牵往远方。青蛙也许会叫得比牛更响，但是它们不能在田里拉犁，也不会在酒坊里牵磨，它们的皮也做不出鞋来。他会帮我打针,然后拔我的牙齿。足球赛吸引了大批观众。一拉绳子钟就响。我觉得有人扯我的袖子，便转过身来。潮汐是月亮引力作用的结果。有些广告毫无吸引力。咱们饭后去划船吧。他对总经理有很大的影响力。

translation: n. 学生；[解剖] 瞳孔；未成年人
examples: The headmaster has made a decision of suspension of a pupil from school.A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.The painting is the work of a pupil of Rembrandt.The tenor was a pupil of Caruso.
校长已经做出对一名学生停学处分的决定。如果班上的人数多，老师就不能给予个别辅导了。这幅画是伦勃朗的一位弟子的作品。这位男高音歌手师承卡鲁索。

translation: n. (女士)手提袋；(国家、家庭、团体等的) 财力vt. （嘴巴）皱起，使缩拢；撅嘴
examples: When did you first miss your purse?The loss of her purse caused her much inconvenience.This piece of china is beyond my purse.Her purse was stolen when she was on the bus.The purse for the next race is $50,000.The sour taste made her purse her lips.Impulsively, she dropped them into her purse.
你什么时候发现丢了钱包的?丢失钱包给她带来了诸多不便。这件瓷器我买不起。她的手袋在公共汽车上被偷了。下一场比赛的奖金为五万美元。酸味使她皱起嘴唇。一时心血来潮，她抓起它们扔进钱包里。

translation: vt. 推动，增加；对…施加压力，逼迫；按；说服vi. 推进；增加；努力争取n. 推，决心；大规模攻势；矢志的追求
examples: The little boy pushed the door open.They jeep is too heavy for him to push.You may push this button to call the elevator.We had to push our way through the crowd.Don't push him hard for a settlement.You'd better not push me for an answer to your request.He opened the door with one push.It only needed a push and the whole building will come tumble down.Let's make a push to get it done tonight.She has the push to get to the top.
小男孩把门推开了。吉普车太重,他推不动。你可以按这个按钮叫电梯。我们得从人群中挤过去。别太逼他给你解决的办法你最好不要催促我答复你的请求。他一推门就开了。只要稍稍一推，那整幢房子就会倒塌下来。让我们加把劲今晚把它干完。她有名列前茅的决心。

translation: vt. 放；表达；移动；安置；赋予vi. 出发；击；航行；发芽n. 掷；笨蛋；投击；怪人adj. 固定不动的n. (Put)人名；(泰、缅)布
examples: He put his hands in his pockets.She put the grapes onto the platter.Put down my pen and stop fiddling!I've put my entire life into a sound and perfect order.The government has promised to put more police officers on the street.This gas will put you to sleep during the operation.I wish you hadn't told me! it puts me in a really difficult position.The motion was put to the assemblage.I'll put this lunch on my expense account.Make sure that you put down every word she says.How shall I put it?I want to know how to put this in French.He put for home after a hurried meal.The vessel was unable to put to sea on account of the storm.

他把手放在口袋里。她把葡萄放到一个大盘子上。把我的钢笔放下，别用手玩弄！我把自己的一生都安排妥当了。政府承诺要在大街上安置更多警力。这种气体将使你在手术中处于睡眠状态。我真希望你没告诉我那件事！这使我现在的处境真的很为难。这项提议已提交大会了。我要把这顿午餐记在我的开支帐户上。切实要记下她说的每一个字。我该怎么说呢？我想知道如何用法语来表达这件事。他匆匆吃完饭就出发回家了。因为有暴风雨，所以这些船不能开航。

translation: 经过；走过；逝去
examples: This task is accomplished by great effort.They cap when they pass the president.He gave me a cheery wink as I passed by.I saw Xiao Yang walking by, shouldering two hoes.
这项任务是经过巨大努力才完成的。他们经过院长面前时脱帽行礼。我走过的时候他亲切地朝我眨眨眼睛。我看到小扬扛着两把锄头从旁走过。

translation: 注意；重视
examples: He called my attention to some new evidence.The problem presented itself for their attention.Pay more attention to the voice of youth.Take heed of what he says, if you want to succeed.
他要我注意一些新的证据。那问题引起了他们的注意。多留意年轻人的意见。假如你想成功，就得留意他说的话。

translation: vt. 偿还；报答
examples: He has a huge overdraft to pay off.He paid it back out of his earning.Success is often the pay for hard work.Frank went back to his employer.When he attacked me, naturally I struck back.They fought back in self-defence.I would pay him back for his treacheries.She got back at him by showing me the letter.
他有一大笔透支要偿还。他用挣的钱把它偿还了。成功往往是勤奋的回报。法兰克回报他的东家。他攻击我时我自然要进行还击。他们进行了自卫还击。对他的背信弃义我要报复。她把那封信拿给我看，以此来报复他。

translation: 赔偿；为…而付钱；为…付出代价
examples: He has a huge overdraft to pay off.You reimburse a person for expenses made for you.She stalled for time to earn enough money to pay.Examine the account well before you pay it.
他有一大笔透支要偿还。你要偿还他人为你花的钱。她拖延着，想挣够钱来付款。在付款以前仔细核对一下帐目。

translation: 付清；取得成功；贿赂；报复
examples: He has a huge overdraft to pay off.It took them three years to pay off the debt.Most of the profits are swallowed up by the mortgage. Once we've got that paid off I'll feel we've turned the corner.We paid off the police to let us go with a warning.Our plan certainly paid off; it was a great idea.His hard working will eventually pay off.
他有一大笔透支要偿还。他们三年才还清欠债。房产抵押中耗尽了大部分利润，一旦抵押款偿清，我们就渡过了难关。我们贿赂警察，让我们只得到一次警告就离开。我们的计划当然成功了，那是个很好的主意。他的努力工作终将会得到报偿。

translation: 挑选出
examples: These oxen are marked out for slaughter.It's impossible to pick out only one pair of shoes.It's easy to pick him out in a crowd because he is very tall.The captain said that he could make out a house on the shore.
这些牛是挑出来屠宰的。要想只挑出一双鞋来根本不可能。很容易从人群中辨认出他，因为他个子很高。船长说他能辨认出岸上的一座房子了。

translation: 捡起；获得；收拾；（汽车；飞机）乘载；不费力地学会
examples: He picked up his knife and fork.He picked up the child and put her on his shoulders.He picked up news from all sources.She picked up a valuable first edition at a village book sale.But we have to survive, so I have to pick myself up, and then continue my work.I am able to pick you up on the short wave radio.The dog easily picked up the scent of the murderer.The next morning, my mum came to pick me up.He picked up the girl at a college disco.She's living with some man she picked up on holiday.Pick yourself up and brush yourself down.She soon picked up French when she went to live in France.He is picked up on a charge of killing a man.A cup of coffee might pick you up.

他捡起了刀叉。他抱起孩子让她骑在自己的肩膀上。他从各种渠道收集消息。她在乡村图书展销会上买到一本珍贵的首版书。但我们必须活下去,所以我必须鞭策自己继续做下去。我能用短波收音机收听到你的信号。狗毫不费力地嗅出了谋杀者的气味。第二天早上,我的妈妈来接我。他在学校的迪斯科舞会上偶然结识了那姑娘。她与一个在假日认识的男人同住。自己站起来，把衣服掸乾净。她到法国居住后很快就学会了法语。他因犯有杀人罪而被逮捕。喝杯咖啡也许能使你的精神振作起来。

translation: 指出，指明
examples: I beg to point out that your facts are incorrect.Did he point out where you were wrong?Point out the mistake in this sentence, please.
恕我指出你所讲的情况不真确。他有没有指出你什么地方错了？请指出这句话中的错误。

translation: 指向；表明
examples: The finger of the clock points to twelve.Clean your finger before you point at my spot.To have a grievance is to have a purpose in life.Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people.
钟的指针指向十二点。在你指向我的污点之前，先洗净你的指头吧。有委屈和不满就意味着有生活目标。对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。

translation: 阻止，制止；妨碍
examples: Nothing can prevent him from going.These regulations can prevent from the accidents.These rules can prevent from suddenness.You should prevent from the thieves.
什么都不能阻止他前往。这些规则可以预防发生意外。这些规则可以预防发生意外。妳当然应该防备小偷.

translation: 放好；抛弃；储存
examples: This vase wasn't wiped out properly before it was put away.Put your toys away in the cupboard, when you've finished playing.She's got a few thousand pounds put away for her retirement.I don't know how he manages to put it all away!He must have put away half a bottle of whisky last night.It's time to put away those foolish ideas.It's time to put away those foolish ideas and become serious.
这个花瓶没擦干净就收起来了。你把玩具玩儿完了以后放进柜子里去。她已存了几千镑以备退休之用。我真不知道他怎么吃得这样多！昨晚他大概喝了半瓶威士忌酒。是该放弃那些愚蠢的想法了。是打消那些愚蠢想法，认真对待的时候了。

translation: 镇压；记下；贬低；制止
examples: The military were called out to put down the riot.He jotted down the conceits of his idle hours.Make sure that you put down every word she says.He was put down for the way he worked.My mother came down on me for coming back late.Helen is always putting him down for nothing.The middle-aged man calmly motioned for the joker to come over to his table, and invited him to sit down.Dennis rebutted them by saying he had put in checks and balances.In the following we will see how the Buddha refutes all the attempts made by Ananda to pin down the locality of the mind.Douglas put away Collins in cold blood.He is said to have been blasted down by his nephew.
军队奉召出动去镇压暴动。他记下了闲暇时想到的一些看法。切实要记下她说的每一个字。他因为工作态度而受到批评。我回来晚了，母亲严厉地批评了我。海伦总是无缘无故地奚落他。中年男子平静地示意这个奚落他的年轻人来到自己的桌前，并请他坐下。丹尼斯反驳说他会检查和平衡的。下面我们会看到佛陀是如何反驳阿难的所有试图确定心的位置的尝试。道格拉斯蓄意杀死了柯林斯。据说他是被他的侄子杀死的。

translation: 推迟；扔掉；阻止
examples: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.Many people are put off by his surly behavior.The game was put off because of rain.Don't put off till tomorrow what can be done today.She was put off maths by a bullying and incompetent teacher.Please put off all smoking material.He put off his departure till Saturday.
今日事今日毕。他举止粗暴使许多人感到气愤。比赛因雨延期。今天可做的事不要拖到明天再做。她对数学失去了兴趣，因为老师仗势欺人又没教学能力。请熄掉所有冒烟的东西。她推迟到星期六启程。

translation: 穿上；上演；增加；假装；使…上场
examples: The man put on his smock and went out.He put on a coat with a fur lining.The old man put on his spectacles and started reading.She put on dark glasses as a protection against the strong light.They are putting on Macbeth next week.She's just putting on her make-up.He must have put on several kilos.
那人穿上罩衫，然后走了出去。他穿上一件有毛皮衬里的外衣。老人戴上眼镜开始看书。她戴上墨镜以防强光的照射。他们下周演出《麦克白》。她正在化妆呢。他体重一定增加了好几公斤。

translation: 演出
examples: She is getting up a performance.Her performance was the highlight of the show.
她正在筹备一场演出。她的表演是那场演出中最精彩的部分。

translation: 体重增加
examples: Too many sweet foods may make you put on weight.I'm afraid I am putting on weight.
太多的甜食可能会使你增加体重。我担心我增加体重啦。

translation: 熄灭；伸出；出版；使不方便，打扰
examples: The government put out a warning against flood.Far water does not put out near fire.A gale warning has just been put out.Do not ask me who put out the light.I'll try to put out some feelers to gauge people's reactions to our proposal.Haywood put out a lot of money at 6 percent.I am put out for he is always partial to one while neglecting the other.His action incensed his wife who came out of the house, shouting abuse.The boats will put out to sea on this evening's high tide.She sent him a Dear John letter just as he put out to sea.You must work hard to ride out a storm.He put out the same for seven managers.
政府发出了预防水灾的警告。[谚]远水救不了近火。刚才发出了大风警报。我不知道谁把电灯关掉的。我想试探一下，看看人们对我们建议的反应。海伍德放了许多债，收6%25的利息。我被他厚此薄彼激怒了。他的行为激怒了他的老婆，她从房子里冲出来，大声辱骂着。今天晚上涨潮时这些船就要启航。就在他启航那一刻,她寄给他一封绝交信。你们必须努力工作以渡过难关。他同七位管理人员一样做出努力。

translation: 提供；建造；举起；提高；推举，提名；供给…住宿；直接行动
examples: Tom put his lunch up in a bag.The farmers put up the apples in barrels.To join the club you have to be put up by an existing member.We can put you up for the night.They are putting up several new buildings in that block.He put up his hand to ask a question.My landlord's threatening to put the rent up by 10 a week.The names of the successful candidates will be put up on the College notice board.I'm afraid he can't put you up.Tom told Peter that he would pass the examination, and Peter told Tom to put up or shut up.
汤姆把午饭放进了一个包里。农夫们把苹果装入箱内。要加入俱乐部必须有一位会员做介绍人。我们可以招待你过夜。他们正在那一街区建几幢楼房。他将手举起来发问问题。我的房东要挟说要把每周租金提高10英镑。录取名单将公布在学院布告栏里。恐怕他不能为你提供食宿。汤姆告诉彼得，他一定能通过这次考试；彼得告诉汤姆说，要么拿出行动来证明，要么就别说。

translation: v. 忍受；容忍
examples: CAN'T PUT UP WITH YOUR UNTIDINESS ANY MORE.That woman has a lot to put up with.I have no mind to put up with any nonsense.He can't stand for those who put on airs.
我再也不能忍受你的杂乱无章了。那个女人有许多烦恼要忍受。我不想容忍任何胡言乱语。他不能容忍摆架子的人。
